basicData.name: Dear Hotel
basicData.title: Dear Hotel
basicData.body:
This four-star hotel is just a stone's throw from the Plaza de España, right in the heart of the city. It is set within a historic building dating from 1945, which has been fully refurbished in a timeless style that combines original elements of the building with other more contemporary components, creating majestic elegance with avant-garde touches.

The Dear Hotel has 162 bedrooms including nine suites located between floors 10 and 12, offering the best views over the Plaza de España, Casa de Campo Park, and the mountains surrounding Madrid. On the 14th floor there is a large terrace where you will find the restaurant Nice to Meet You, offering contemporary modern cuisine, and the lounge area. There is also a swimming pool there, ideal for cooling down on a hot summer's day.

basicData.name: NH Madrid Alonso Martínez
basicData.title: NH Madrid Alonso Martínez
basicData.body: Hotel NH Madrid Alonso Martínez, formerly known as NH Embajada, has been completely refurbished in 2014. A three-star establishment that combines design, elegance and functionality inside with a beautiful classical facade. It is located in the Chamberí district, just 100 metres from Plaza Alonso Martínez. The new NH hotel boasts 101 rooms, including ten superior rooms and a junior suite. It also provides room service, referred to as Room Apetit, and a lobby that is the real centrepiece of the hotel.

basicData.name: The Hat
basicData.title: The Hat
basicData.body: With all of the comfort of a hotel and the central location of a hostel, The Hat represents a new vision of accommodation in one of the most central and traditional parts of the city. Occupying a remodelled 19th century stately home, the hotel's 42 rooms – containing a total of 220 beds – are decorated in a functional and ecological style with vintage touches that bring it into line with the interior decoration seen in the most modern hotels. It offers common areas for use by residents and tourists alike. The most notable of these is the multi-purpose room known as The Cave, used as a venue for exhibitions, concerts and DJ sessions. It also has a solarium for exclusive use by hotel guests, which becomes a sky bar open to the public at night, with open-air barbecues and showcooking offered at the weekend.

basicData.name: URSO Hotel & Spa Madrid
basicData.title: URSO Hotel & Spa Madrid
basicData.body: This 5-star boutique hotel is situated between the residential neighbourhood of Chamberí and the ever bustling streets of the Chueca neighbourhood. Housed within the headquarters of the former Paper Company, a palatial building constructed in 1915, the hotel's stained glass and tile façade and its sunny inner central courtyard lead to a modern establishment with 78 classically elegant rooms and suites, several of which have private balconies and overlook the former gardens of Palacio Villagonzalo, the stately home of the Count of Villagonzalo. The hotel’s ground floor features a spa by Natura Bissé, a beauty and wellness firm, which offers a range of exclusive treatments in facilities that include a two-person massage room, an area with water jets and a hot and cold water circuit.

basicData.name: One Shot 04
basicData.title: One Shot 04
basicData.body: One Shot 04 is located in the stately Barrio de Salamanca, and is also very close to Madrid's main museums and its financial centre. Each of the hotel's 64 rooms is equipped with a flat screen television, extra-comfy beds with 4 pillows, complementary WiFi and spacious showers with rainfall effect showerheads. Additional services include electric bicycle hire and private transfer services, in addition to temporary exhibitions held on a frequent basis.

basicData.name: Hotel Indigo
basicData.title: Hotel Indigo
basicData.body:
The design of the hotel was inspired by Gran Vía. The street has an impressive history and has been the scene of many films, protests, songs, etc. The walls and rooms of the Indigo are intended to reflect this intense life. And this is the hotel's philosophy: live in, work in and enjoy the district in which it stands. Guests can enjoy the local flavour of nearby restaurants and the staff are always willing to offer suggestions about little-known attractions in the area.

The hotel belongs to the Intercontinental Hotels Group, which includes Intercontinental, Holiday Inn and Crowne Plaza, among others. All rooms have independent heating and air conditioning, 40-inch TV, a rain shower with stimulating spray, and high-end bathroom amenities. High speed wi-fi is available throughout the hotel.

basicData.name: Hotel Innside Madrid Luchana
basicData.title: Innside Madrid Luchana
basicData.body:
Located in the traditional Chamberí district, in a 20th century neoclassical building that has been completely renovated with a contemporary design maintaining the original appearance of its façade, this is a small hotel with a lot of character. It has 43 el- egant rooms and suites, all simply decorated, functional and con- temporary.

They are all equipped with everything today’s traveller needs, including the latest technology, WiFi, a computer tray to work from bed, and a mini bar with free soft drinks. Facilities at Madrid Luchana include a modern rooftop cocktail bar (Club 22), with fabulous city views, and a Mediterranean fusion restaurant (Dado) for lovers of good food, which is also an excellent choice for local clients and business lunches.

basicData.name: One Shot 23
basicData.title: One Shot 23
basicData.body:
Located in the Literary quarter, hotel One Shot arose from the vocation to combine the concepts of culture, beauty and art in one building. With careful decoration by the Las2Mercedes studio, this hotel has exhibitions by different artists and an up-to-date agenda of the leisure activities in the cities where it is present.

There are several types of room, depending on the client profile. One Patio Room, a room designed for travelers that make the most of the night and later want to sleep without being disturbed. The One Shot Room is an ideal room for art lovers. One Balcony Room for romantic travelers and movie lovers that value big screens and the pleasure of watching a good film in bed. The One Terrace Room has been designed for those that need space and want to sleep under the stars. Finally, the One Top Room is designed for traveling families or for 3 adults.

As extra services, the One Shot 23 hotel offers bike renting, temporary exhibitions, WIFI in rooms and common areas, airport and train station transfer service and nocturnal shoe cleaning service.

basicData.name: U Hostels
basicData.title: U Hostels
basicData.body:
Hostels are sometimes associated with adjectives such as dirty or uncomfortable. U Hostels aim to reach the winning combination: a mixture of hotel and hostel where the customer receives the best of both. Cleanliness, comfort and relaxation normally found in a hotel with the prices and experiences of meeting new people that are normally found in hostels. This is how the concept of U Hostels came about, installed in the central neighborhood of Chamberí.

It occupies an old palace that has been reformed with a carefully chosen design in Sagasta street with 5 floors. The rooms, mostly exterior and with balconies, are large and bright and are cleaned daily. There are rooms for 2 people with a bathroom, shared rooms for 4, 6, 8 and 12 people and rooms for girls only.

The hostel has restaurants, a cafeteria, a chill out area, library, cinema, terrace and free WIFI in the entire hostel.

As a service to the customers, U Hostels offers a leisure guide with the shows and cultural events in the city.

basicData.name: La posada de El Chaflán
basicData.title: La posada de El Chaflán
basicData.body:
Juan Pablo Felipe has converted the former Aristos hotel into a pretty but functional establishment. All the rooms have the stamp of the famous chef, with sustainability a driving force.

La posada de El Chaflán provides free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel and boasts a sophisticated penthouse with views over the Cuatro Torres Business Area. Of course, the main attraction of the hotel is its restaurant, El Chaflán, where Juan Pablo Felipe dazzles with his famous culinary repertoire: innovative Andaluz cuisine, with special care taken to use fresh ingredients such as almadraba tuna, olive oil and fresh vegetables.

basicData.name: Be Live City Airport Madrid Diana
basicData.title: Be Live City Airport Madrid Diana
basicData.body:
Very close to Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas airport, is this comfortable hotel, part of the Believe hotel chain and perfect for the business traveller. With free WIFI, Be Smart offers room only accommodation or room and breakfast in its double, triple and superior rooms. The triple rooms are ideal for groups or families. All rooms are exterior facing, with free WIFI, bathroom, LCD televisions, amenities and alarm call service.

Near the IFEMA trade park, the Alameda de Osuna metro station is close by, which connects you to the centre of the city in under 30 minutes. There is also access the the M-30 and M-40 ring roads.

basicData.name: Innside Madrid Suecia
basicData.title: Innside Madrid Suecia
basicData.body:
This new hotel is situated right in the centre of Madrid, next to the historical Círculo de Bellas Artes, very close to Calle Alcalá and Gran Vía, and in the fully refurbished Hotel Casa de Suecia, where Ernest Hemingway lived in the fifties. The hotel has 120 rooms and 7 suites, boasts modern, simple and functional decor, and has Wi- Fi, a computer tray to work from bed, flat-screen TV and a mini bar with soft drinks included.

Some of the suites also have a lounge and a terrace, especially the Loft Premium, which affords an amaz- ing panoramic view of Madrid. Its facilities include The Balcony, a modern cocktail bar on the top floor; Dado Deli, a restaurant on the ground floor; the Lounge Bar, which is ideal for having a snack any time of day; a fitness centre; a swimming pool on the rooftop; and multifunctional areas for meetings and events, especially its large terrace on the 11th floor, with a spectacular view.

basicData.name: Exe Moncloa
basicData.title: Hotel Exe Moncloa
basicData.body:
The Exe Moncloa is a gourmet hotel inaugurated along with its twin project, the Mercado Moncloa, a revamped market. The ground floor is occupied by shops and gastronomic spaces laid out like a market. The eight floors above it have 161 spacious, mod- ern, bright rooms, equipped with plasma TV, minibar, free WiFi, a desk, air conditioning, and a full bathroom with whirlpool bath and hairdryer. There are 6 rooms adapted for disabled people.

The Exe Moncloa also has a gym, sauna, steam bath, a small outdoor pool and a stunning rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the Gua- darrama mountain range. The hotel also has three fully equipped meeting rooms.

basicData.name: Only You Hotel & Lounge Madrid
basicData.title: Only You Hotel & Lounge Madrid
basicData.body:
Only You Hotel & Lounge Madrid is a surprising combination of a boutique hotel and the current trend of lifestyle establishments. Located in an historical 19th-century palace right in the heart of Madrid, it has 70 rooms - each with its own personality. The lounge is the ho- tel’s main stage - a lively area where cocktails, innovative gastronomy and music create a unique atmosphere that evolves as the day goes on, adapting to each moment.

Its contemporary, elegant and com- fortable style provides a surprising combination of colonial shades with a Mediterranean touch. This amazing fusion was achieved thanks to little details in its interior design - taken care of by the Lázaro Rosa Violán design studio - which bring Madrid’s cosmopoli- tan spirit to the building. All the little corners and details have been carefully planned to help you rest, enjoy, and get to know and feel the city in a special and different way. A little detail worth highlighting is that you can have breakfast at any time of day.

basicData.name: Holiday Inn Madrid - Calle Alcalá
basicData.title: Holiday Inn Madrid - Calle Alcalá
basicData.body: This hotel is located in the famous Calle de Alcalá, just a 15-minute metro ride from the centre of Madrid and all its famous tourist attractions. It has 261 rooms, including rooms with one or two beds, executive rooms and Junior Suites, all with private bathroom, television, minibar, air conditioning, Wi-Fi and heating. It also has 17 meeting rooms, a gym, and a restaurant on the ground floor, El Tostado, which specialises in local and Mediterranean dishes. It is an ideal place to stay for holidaymakers and business travellers. This hotel is an ideal place to stay for holidaymakers and business travellers.

basicData.name: Eurostars Plaza Mayor
basicData.title: Eurostars Plaza Mayor
basicData.body:
In the very centre of Madrid, just 300 metres from Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol, two of the most traditional spots in Madrid, a new, daringly designed hotel has been erected. The Eurostars Plaza Mayor Hotel occupies the site of what was once the famous Frontón Madrid handball sports arena. It is housed in two seven- storey buildings, with 92 designer rooms, equipped with the latest technology and decorated with fine materials such as stone and glass mosaics.

All the rooms are doubles and have free WiFi, LCD satellite TV, individual air conditioning, bath and hairdryer, and other amenities. One of the best surprises is the breakfast room, located on the seventh floor, where you can enjoy a beautiful view over the rooftops of central Madrid. There is also a small, romantic outdoor terrace.

basicData.name: Apartamentos Spain Select
basicData.title: Spain Select Apartments
basicData.body:
Spain Select, a company that lets luxury apartments in Madrid, has over 200 furnished apartments fitted out to the highest standard. From one-bedroom apartments to large attics with balconies - situated in the most central areas of the city (Centre, Austrias, Cortes, Justicia, Malasaña, Retiro, Salamanca, Chamberí and Chamartín) - prices start from €95/day.

They provide a large variety of exclusive services, such as telephone assistance, maintenance services, cleaning, etc. Prices include taxes and utilities, and also internet, air conditioning, heating, TV, DVD, fully-equipped kitchen with crockery, vitroceramic hob, oven, microwave, fridge, dishwasher and washing-machine, bathrooms with hairdryer and toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, shower gel and hand soap), towels and sheets.

basicData.name: Hotel Innside Madrid Génova
basicData.title: Hotel Innside Madrid Génova
basicData.body:
Located in another neoclassical building, also in the Chamberí district, its fresh design offering charm and comfort, combined with modern equipment and fast, efficient service, allow guests to enjoy the chain’s authentic lifestyle experience, whether on a business trip or a city break for pleasure. Its 65 rooms include comfortable, spacious suites, some with their own private terrace, the Tower Suite located just below the dome that crowns the top of the building being the highlight.

Its facilities include the Library Cocktail Lounge, a calm place to relax or read a book while en- joying select cocktails and original appetisers, and the Deck, the cosy interior terrace bathed in natural light, where guests can start the day with a good breakfast or make a booking to hold a private event. The proximity of the two Innside hotels means guests can enjoy all the services offered by both, regardless of which one they are staying at.

basicData.name: Artrip Hotel
basicData.title: Artrip Hotel
basicData.body:
It isn't easy to find a hotel like this one in the Lavapiés neighbourhood, a bold, modern cutting-edge design that has been able to blend a series of up-to-date features with history. The hotel building dates from 1900, giving it a very traditional feel, with inner courtyards and spacious balconies overlooking the street. The hotel has been very careful to respect the original structure of the building and has 17 bedrooms, some of which are in the attic and have wooden ceiling beams. The common feature of all the rooms is the light that streams in through the windows and the predominantly white decor.

But this is a hotel unlike any other. It's an art hotel that runs a continuous programme of exhibitions of work by new artists in the lobby. The hotel's support for new creative artists makes this an even more special place and an excellent operations base for anyone wanting to enjoy first-rate attractions in Madrid, like El Rastro open-air market and the area's international restaurants. And while we're on the subject of food, the hotel has a café where you can tuck into a healthy Mediterranean-style breakfast featuring home-made products (bread, yogurts, jams and so on). For people who like a lie-in, breakfast is served up until twelve noon.

basicData.name: Hotel Petit Palace Lealtad Plaza
basicData.title: Hotel Petit Palace Lealtad Plaza
basicData.body:
This 4-star hotel is located in Calle Antonio Maura, between the Puerta de Alcalá and the AVE-Atocha train station. It is only a few metres from the Art Walk, where the Prado Museum, Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Reina Sofía Museum, and CaixaForum Madrid are to be found, and the famous Retiro Park.

The hotel has three meeting rooms with natural daylight and an outdoor patio, which can hold up to 100 people. Facilities include projectors and screens and free internet access.

basicData.name: Hotel Petit Palace Savoy Alfonso XII
basicData.title: Hotel Petit Palace Savoy Alfonso XII
basicData.body: A fine example of good taste and modern design, this 4 star hotel which belongs to the Petit Palace High Tech chain boasts an unbeatable location. Just a stone’s throw from El Retiro Park and Puerta de Alcalá, it is situated a few minutes’ walk from Atocha, the city’s main train station, and the museums on the Golden Triangle. A 19th century mansion, it offers 87 rooms that come equipped with laptops, hydromassage shower cabins and king-sized beds.

basicData.name: Petit Palace Santa Bárbara
basicData.title: Petit Palace Santa Bárbara
basicData.body: A fully renovated boutique hotel located in one of the city’s most lively and central areas: Malasaña. The fully renovated nineteenth-century building has high technology and elegant and modern décor in its rooms and also in its one 60 m2 apartment. There is an individual computer and free cable internet connection in each. There is a business centre in the public area of the hotel.

basicData.name: La Posada del Dragón
basicData.title: La Posada del Dragón
basicData.body:
One of the oldest hotels in Madrid, it has been completely transformed into a modern and functional boutique hotel, which is also extremely comfortable. It is located in the centre of Madrid in La Latina (the Latin Quarter) - an area that is well-known for its tapas bars.

It has elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV on flat screen appliances. The rooms have air conditioning and are decorated in a colourful and very modern style. They are all soundproofed and have an en-suite bathroom with hairdryer. On arrival, guests receive a welcome drink.

The hotel restaurant serves traditional Spanish food with a modern twist, made from fresh ingredients. There is also a modern bar. The 24-hour reception staff at La Posada can help you book tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire a bicycle or car at reception. Late check-out is available – up to 4pm. The hotel is 10 minutes from the Royal Palace on foot and only 100 metres from the Plaza Mayor. The La Latina metro station is 200 metres away.

basicData.name: Catalonia Plaza Mayor
basicData.title: Catalonia Plaza Mayor
basicData.body: This may be the best place to stay in Madrid: right in Plaza Mayor, in the heart of the city, surrounded by museums, cultural centres, tapas bars, and the general hustle and bustle of the city. This modern hotel offers guests every comfort: parquet flooring, air conditioning, heating, 32” screen television with satellite channels and Canal+, free wireless internet access, safe, minibar, telephone service, as well as marble bathrooms with a telephone and hairdryer. The hotel also offers magnificent Mediterranean cuisine in its restaurant, a bar, an internet access area and meeting rooms. Sheer luxury in the heart of Madrid.

basicData.name: Catalonia Atocha
basicData.title: Catalonia Atocha
basicData.body:
This hotel, one of several in the Catalonia chain in Madrid, offers guests the opportunity to enjoy the city at its finest. It is located in the Hapsburg district, one of the most attractive areas in the city centre and one of the most popular with tourists, near Puerta del Sol, the main museums (Prado, Reina Sofía, Thyssen), and the Retiro Park. The hotel offers all the comfort of a reputed four-star establishment.

Its comfortable rooms have parquet flooring and offer: telephone service, free wireless internet access, satellite TV, a minibar, and safe. The bathrooms are decorated in marble with telephone and hairdryer. The hotel also boasts a solarium and pool on the top terrace, a restaurant featuring Mediterranean cuisine, a café bar, a library, an internet access area and meeting rooms.

basicData.name: Hotel NH Ribera del Manzanares
basicData.title: Hotel NH Ribera del Manzanares
basicData.body:
This recently renovated area along the banks of the Manzanares River now boasts various establishments offering tourist and leisure activities, one of which is the new Ribera del Manzanares hotel belonging to the NH chain. Facing the new promenade area, next to the gardens and recreational areas of the Manzanares River development, the hotel is very close to downtown Madrid, the Royal Palace and Almudena Cathedral.

With its modern design and sophisticated feel throughout, this hotel gives a sophisticated feel in all its rooms and public areas. The NH Ribera del Manzanares offers large junior suites, family rooms and rooms suitable for the disabled. An ideal location for business travelers, as well as families.

Furthermore, the hotel, conscious of its location in this refurbished area of Madrid, is environmentally friendly with energy efficient solar panels, efficient water management and a car park where electric vehicles can be charged. We also incorporate a "one to One" concept of cuisine, based on "semifinished premium produce" designed by the well known chef and consultant for the chain's restoration, Enrique Martinez.

basicData.name: Posada del León de Oro
basicData.title: Posada del León de Oro
basicData.body:
Posada del León de Oro is situated in La Latina, one of Madrid's most bohemian districts, just 100 metres from Plaza Mayor. It offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with satellite TV.

All rooms at the Hotel Posada del León de Oro are soundproofed, have air conditioning and heating as well as a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. The Posada has a restaurant which serves traditional regional food with a modern twist. There is also a bar, and the hotel has a 24-hour reception. It is a stone's throw from the Royal Palace and Puerta del Sol, Madrid’s most famous square.

basicData.name: Nh Palacio de Tepa
basicData.title: Nh Palacio de Tepa
basicData.body:
The NH chain has renovated this old Madrid palace to accommodate a luxury hotel next to Plaza Santa Ana, in the heart of the Literary Quarter.

With a minimalistic but cosy décor that makes the most of natural light, it offers 85 elegant rooms that combine 18th-century Spanish architecture and all the latest mod-cons. Luxury and comfort are guaranteed in this hotel just a stone’s throw from the capital’s top museums.

In the reception area, underneath a glass floor, you can see the remains of an old channel that carried water into Madrid in the 17th century. During the 18th century, the building that once stood on the site of the palace housed the Fonda de San Sebastián, an inn that hosted the very first modern "tertulia" (a social gathering for intellectual discussion) and whose distinguished customers included figures such as Francisco de Goya, José Cadalso, Jovellanos, Felix María Samaniego and Tomás de Iriarte.

basicData.name: Suites 33
basicData.title: Suites 33
basicData.body: If you like being right in the centre of the city, with everything on hand, then the Hotel Suites 33 is your best bet. Situated in the heart of Madrid, it offers the utmost comfort in a quiet, pleasant atmosphere. The Hotel Suite 33 occupies a classical, Madrid-style building dating from the reign of Isabella II. Both its interiors and its façade were recently renovated to offer guests the best and most modern service. Although the establishment has very few rooms and there is no restaurant, the outstanding location is a great attraction. A breakfast buffet is available at the nearby El Coloso Hotel.

basicData.name: SHS Aeropuerto
basicData.title: SHS Aeropuerto
basicData.body: This hotel offers quality accommodation for business trips at a reasonable price. It provides all the services required by this type of clientele (business centre, airport shuttle service, shuttle service to IFEMA Trade Fair Park, free Wi-Fi access throughout, etc). Families are also welcomed and will find this practical and functional establishment well suited to their needs.

basicData.name: Barajas Plaza
basicData.title: Barajas Plaza
basicData.body:
The Barajas Plaza hotel is ideally situated for business travellers, and offers every comfort for even the most discerning clientele. Located next to Adolfo Suárez Madrid - Barajas airport, the IFEMA Trade Fair Park, the Conference Centre, the Real Madrid football ground and the Olivar de la Hinojosa golf course, the hotel is in a prime position very near to the city centre.

It is only a few minutes away from Madrid’s main tourist attractions. The hotel offers private parking, a large outdoor terrace,  double and twin rooms, as well as rooms and facilities for the disabled. The building has air conditioning and heating, with 24 hour reception and a wireless internet connection.

basicData.name: Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport
basicData.title: Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport
basicData.body:
This newly-opened hotel, part of the InterContinental chain, is only fifteen minutes from the city centre, five minutes from IFEMA Trade Fair Park and nine minutes from the airport. The name Crowne Plaza is well known to business travellers, as the hotels are designed for guests wishing to enjoy their business trip and make the best of their stay.

With these clients in mind, the hotel offers high-speed wireless internet access and a 24-hour business centre. This high-quality designer establishment is functional, practical and easily accessible, with high levels of quality and design. Another of the novelties of Crowne Plaza are the menus called ‘Eat Well, Work Well’, so that guests can maintain their high energy levels during the working day. The head chef at the Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport is César Rodríguez, owner of ‘El Antojo’ restaurant.

basicData.name: Juan de Austria
basicData.title: Juan de Austria
basicData.body:
Situated between Chamberí and theMalasaña neighbourhood, this thematic hotel is based on the life of Spanish grandee Don John of Austria and those who played a part in his life. Thus all the rooms are decorated in one of the four styles of the sixteenth century: Colonial, Venetian, Castilian or the palatial Flanders style.

All rooms have an elegant feel to them with additional features such as: controlled air conditioning/heating, self regulating taps, two-speed hairdryer, digital telephone, internet access, LCD colour television, minibar, electric suit valet and individual safe. The rooms also contain items from the hotel’s outstanding art collection.

basicData.name: Tach by Clement Hoteles
basicData.title: Tach by Clement Hoteles
basicData.body:
The aim behind the Clement chain is to give clients the best in quality service, turning each business trip into a pleasurable experience. The Clement Barajas hotel, situated just 3 minutes from the airport and the IFEMA Trade Fair Park, is also within easy reach of downtown Madrid. The rooms have moved away from the more functional look and are decorated in a warm, comfortable style.

The hotel’s ‘La Fachada’ restaurant offers a wide range of excellent dishes and guests can also enjoy the buffet in ‘Brasserie La Terraza’. Apart from this, guests will find all the services they need for work and business meetings

basicData.name: Hotel Nuevo Boston
basicData.title: Hotel Nuevo Boston
basicData.body:
Nuevo Boston is a business hotel offering modern rooms and an up-to-date convention centre.

Located near the airport and the IFEMA trade fair grounds, it offers a wide range of services including an outdoor pool, meeting rooms with natural light, equipped with audiovisual systems and the latest technology, free wi-fi in all parts of the hotel, daily press, a booking service for restaurants and theatres, panoramic tours, car, bus, minibus and limousine hire, a free-access business centre and free transfers to the airport (24 hour service) and to IFEMA during fairs. The outdoor swimming pool, equipped with confortable hammocks and a sundeck, allows for full enjoyment of summer in the city.

basicData.name: AC Atocha
basicData.title: AC Atocha
basicData.body:
This recently built modern hotel is located in the heart of Madrid, very close to the Puerta de Atocha station, Paseo del Prado and the Art Triangle of the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía museums. The hotel boasts meeting rooms, a gymnasium and private parking.

As with all AC hotels by Marriot, design plays an important part, while another characteristic feature  of the chain is the free minibar. A designer hotel for a very comfortable stay.

basicData.name: Hotel Santo Domingo
basicData.title: Mercure Madrid Santo Domingo
basicData.body:
This 4-star hotel is located in a privileged area, near the Royal palace, and offers a luxurious, comfortable and original environment in the very centre of Madrid. The hotel is in a 10-story building with solarium and outdoor pool on the roof, and boasts such attractive features as mural paintings by up-and-coming artists in some of the rooms or the amazing hall vaults, decorated with porcelain and gold leaf.

The rooms are thematic, all decorated with different mural paintings by a team of young Spanish artists. Each room recreates a different environment: China, New York, a beach, the jungle, the inside of a fish tank or a flock of birds inspired by Hitchcock’s classic.

Another innovative contribution to the building is the car park, decorated with 1000 m2 of evocative and magical mural paintings that give this otherwise dull space a twist. Art plays a fundamental role in the décor of this original hotel; in this sense, its highly valuable ancient and classic art collection, displayed around the halls and rooms, is absolutely exemplary.

An outdoor swimming pool was opened to the public in 2010 on the terrace. It is open during the summer months and allows sunbathing, a cooling dip and a refreshing drink by the water. The pool has a strong water pout which allows for counter-current swimming and a curtain of water for neck massage. As in all areas of the hotel, the pool is adapted for use by disabled clients.

basicData.name: Hostal Gala
basicData.title: Hostal Gala
basicData.body:
A hostel that provides the same services as a hotel in the centre of Madrid, next to the Plaza de Callao and very near Sol: en-suite bathroom with hydro massage shower in all rooms, air conditioning, WiFi, dry-cleaning service...

Hostal Gala is designed to provide modernity, comfort and simplicity for those who don’t want to spend more on sleeping arrangements but who don’t want to do without their comforts either. Comfort is being able to get anywhere on foot or in just a few minutes: Puerta del Sol, Palacio Oriente, Gran Vía, the famous Chueca area or Madrid’s Golden Triangle, which includes its 3 most famous museums of art: the Prado, Reina Sofía and Thyssen Bornemisza. It is surrounded by shops, restaurants, bars and clubs. Everything you hope you to find in Madrid is just a few minutes from your hostel.

basicData.name: Espahotel Gran Vía
basicData.title: Espahotel Gran Vía
basicData.body:
Located right on Gran Vía avenue’s shopping area, next to Plaza de España and near the Royal Palace and the Teatro Real opera house. It’s just three kilometres from the San Carlos teaching hospital.

Its spacious apartments have all the services you might expect from a hotel: they are equipped with TV, telephones, air conditioning and bathrooms. The building was entirely refurbished in 1995.

basicData.name: The Principal Madrid Hotel
basicData.title: The Principal Madrid Hotel
basicData.body:
Located on the historic Gran Vía, having just celebrated its first one hundred years in the city centre, The Principal Madrid Hotel offers its guests the opportunity to explore everything Madrid has to offer.  

Located in a building of notable and traditional architecture, this boutique hotel offers luxury and proximity to all that Madrid has to offer: theatres, museums and monuments that are easily accessible from the hotel. It boasts 76 comfortable and modern rooms equipped with all of the necessary comforts. The hotel boasts a large terrace from where you can enjoy one of the most spectacular views of the city. The attic combines avant-garde haute cuisine with a menu designed by chef, Ramón Freixa, and the most traditional cocktail bar, all of which is accompanied by the best music.

basicData.name: Radisson Blu Hotel Prado
basicData.title: Radisson Blu Hotel Prado
basicData.body:
The Madrid Prado is the first Radisson Blu hotel to have opened in the Spanish capital. Boasting an unbeatable location opposite the famous Prado Museum and next to the CaixaForum cultural centre, it has impressive public spaces and elegant rooms, designed by Sandra Tarruella and Isabel López (two of our country’s best interior decorators).

Guests can choose from any of its standard rooms, decorated with eye-catching photos of Madrid’s skyline. Just a stone’s throw away from all the city’s major tourist attractions, the Madrid Prado boasts a restaurant-grill, a bar, a fully-equipped gym, spa treatment rooms, a sauna and an indoor pool.

basicData.name: Mayerling
basicData.title: Chic & Basic Mayerling
basicData.body:
A new concept of hotel for the city centre. An old textile warehouse located in the famous and centric Hapsburg Madrid was transformed into a hotel with all the features typical of this brand.

This mix of history and contemporary design makes the hotel very chic and charming. with no frills but excellent taste and cosiness. The simple but comfortable rooms are decorated in black and white and their glass showers are the brand’s trademark.

Its “be yourself” area has sofas where you can relax andfree Internet; the “help yourself” area lets you drink your fill of coffee or water for free at any time of the day and the “love yourself” area, located on the terrace, has hammocks for sunbathing. You don’t need to empty your pockets any more to find accommodation with all necessary comforts in the centre of Madrid.

basicData.name: Urban Sea Atocha
basicData.title: Urban Sea Atocha
basicData.body: A new concept in accommodation by the Blue Sea Hotels chain in the centre of Madrid, close to the Atocha train station. Its objective is to provide hotel rooms at hostel rates. No luxury or ostentation, but plenty of good taste.

basicData.name: Axor Feria
basicData.title: Axor Feria
basicData.body:
This Axor establishment specialises in event management and is located near Adolfo Suárez Madrid - Barajas Airport. The hotel’s multipurpose rooms can accommodate up to 200 people. This hotel chain caters primarily for business tourists.

The meeting rooms boast modern designs and are flooded by natural light, with equipment for team work and individual workstations, equipped with the latest technology, with facilities for users with reduced mobility, plus work menus and WiFi connections.

The hotels are staffed by personnel specialised in the sector, with a multilingual reception staff and hostesses for larger events. The rooms are equipped with the facilities business travellers expect, from the latest technological services to the most basic options. The hotel also has a functional, bright cafeteria, with an avant-garde design, open air gardens and several thematic rooms, like a screening room, reading room, meeting room, Internet room and entertainment room.

basicData.name: Axor Barajas
basicData.title: Axor Barajas
basicData.body:
This Axor chain specialises in event management and is located near Adolfo Suárez Madrid - Barajas Airport. The hotel’s multipurpose rooms can accommodate up to 200 people. These establishments cater primarily for business tourists.

The meeting rooms boast modern designs and are flooded by natural light, with equipment for team work and individual workstations, equipped with the latest technology, with facilities for users with reduced mobility, plus work menus and WiFi connections.

The hotels are staffed by personnel specialised in the sector, with multilingual reception staff and hostesses for larger events. The rooms are equipped with the facilities business travellers expect, from the latest technological services to the most basic options. The hotel also has a functional, bright cafeteria, with an avant-garde design, open air gardens and several thematic rooms, like a screening room, reading room, meeting room, Internet room and entertainment room.

basicData.name: Oxum
basicData.title: Oxum
basicData.body:
This hostel is a pleasant, comfortable, modern option located in the Chueca area, in the centre of Madrid. Guests can walk to all the main museums and to many of the most important commercial areas in the city. The establishment’s rooms are pleasant and affordable.

All rooms have en suite bathrooms and some have king size beds, plasma satellite television, fridge / mini bar, microwave, coffee machine, kettle, ironing board, hair dryer, cd / radio, DVD, air-conditioning, heating, Ipod dock and free WiFi. In all, the hostel offers all the services needed to ensure a pleasant stay without spending a fortune on accommodation.

basicData.name: Mirador de Chamartín
basicData.title: Mirador de Chamartín
basicData.body:
The hotel is located in a peaceful business area in the north of Madrid, well connected to the airport, the IFEMA trade fair complex and the city centre. This makes Mirador de Chamartín the ideal option for both business and leisure. The hotel was refurbished in 2008, combining luxury and technology, the latest trends and comfort.

Standard rooms have two single beds, junior suites have a separate living area with armchairs and a desk, and suites have kitchens where guests will find everything they need to prepare a meal. However, you can also eat at the hotel restaurant, choosing delicious dishes from a menu specialising in Mediterranean gastronomy. The outdoor pool offers the possibility of getting a tan and having a refreshing swim. It is surrounded by lawns and gardens, which helps you to disconnect from a long day.

basicData.name: Apartosuite Jardines de Sabatini
basicData.title: Apartosuites Jardines de Sabatini
basicData.body:
This establishment combines the services of a hotel with the advantages of an apartment, thanks to its spacious rooms equipped with fully fitted kitchens. The ApartoSuites Jardines de Sabatini provide comfortable studios and suites with capacity for up to four people and their guests can enjoy spectacular views of the Royal Palace from their individual balcony.

Their central location next to the Plaza de España, from which you can make out the Royal Palace, is ideal for visiting the historic quarter of Madrid and enjoying the shops and shows on the Gran Vía. You can also enjoy the work created by the Madrid urban art group Boa Mistura at the beginning of 2014. The mural is called “Del corazón al cielo” (From the heart to the heavens). This is yet another reason to stay at the hotel as there are other artistic installations by the group on the landings of the different floors, made from items recycled from Madrid waste (doors, bottles, glass, etc.)

basicData.name: Felipe V
basicData.title: Felipe V
basicData.body: This hostel is located in an historic building, a former palace, very close to the Puerta del Sol and the Plaza Mayor. It is situated right on the Gran Vía, one of the city's most important areas in terms of history and monuments, and also one of Madrid's most cosmopolitan shopping areas. The rooms have a lounge area with television, telephone, and safe. They also have a private bathroom with shower or bathtub.

basicData.name: Suites Barrio de Salamanca
basicData.title: Suites Barrio de Salamanca
basicData.body:
These suites are located in one of the city’s most select areas, making them the perfect place to relax when travelling on business or for pleasure. Furthermore, the Salamanca district is one of the city’s main commercial and cultural areas.

This hotel has managed to successfully combine design and functionality with a pleasant and warm atmosphere. Suites Barrio de Salamanca offers guests 22 rooms with independent living rooms and 10 Junior Suites with living areas in the bedroom area. All rooms have en suite bathrooms with baths, free wifi, mini bar and safe box.

basicData.name: NH Suites Prisma
basicData.title: NH Suites Prisma
basicData.body:
This hotel is located in Chamberí, near Nuevos Ministerios and Azca, close to the Paseo de la Castellana and the commercial area in the Salamanca district. Thanks to its location, the range of cultural and leisure options is amazing, with museums, shops and restaurants in the vicinity.

Suites Prisma is a comfortable hotel with multiple services like Internet connection, safe box at reception, laundry service, all with the NH Hoteles seal of quality. Guests can dine at the restaurant, where they can choose from a long list of appetising and well-prepared dishes.

basicData.name: Aparthotel Encasa
basicData.title: Aparthotel Encasa
basicData.body:
Encasa are serviced apartments situated in a privileged location in the outskirts of the city of Madrid, surrounded by a complete network of motorways (M-30, M-40, M-45, M-50, A-2 and A-3), public transport services, and very near Atocha Train Station and Estación Sur Bus Station. Guests can get to the city centre in thirty minutes. IFEMA is 8 kilometres away and Barajas Airport is a mere 9 kilometres away. This accommodation option is also ideal for students, since it is located between Universidad Rey Juan Carlos’ Vicálvaro Campus and the Universidad Politécnica de Madrid’s Southern Campus. It is easy to access both by car or public transport.

The complex consists of 45m2 serviced apartments which are ideal for long stays or for accommodation by days, offering the facilities of a hotel in a setting as comfortable as your own home. Apartments have fully equipped kitchens with everything you might need to cook yourself a meal. Reception is open 24/7 and the price includes courier services, Internet access in apartments and common areas, daily newspapers at reception and living areas located on each floor. It’s the ideal option for people travelling to Madrid for work or on business, or even for tourists who prefer to be fully independent.

geoData.address: Vicálvaro a la estación de O´Donnell, 18

basicData.name: Hotel Único
basicData.title: Hotel Único
basicData.body:
The hotel  is located in a traditional 19th century Madrid building renovated by Aurelio Rubio, who respected its historic value during the refurbishment work to create a comfortable venue that has become a popular choice of accommodation in the city. It is located in the most cosmopolitan and elegant area of the capital, the noble Salamanca district, surrounded by the most exclusive shops and near the art triangle formed by the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía museums.

The unique décor was created by Manolo Melón and his team from Aplomo. The result is a perfect combination of innovative design and sophisticated elegance that makes it a benchmark for exclusive hotels in Madrid. Each room presents a perfect combination of design and comfort. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service, individual air-conditioning/heating, a mini bar, direct phone line, safe for laptops, hairdryer, Hi-Fi, mp3 connection, DVD player and flat LCD screen, satellite and digital interactive television and free Wi-Fi. As you would expect in a hotel of this category, the restaurant serves excellent cuisine created by renowned chef Ramón Freixa, whose delights diners with his innovative creations and Mediterranean flair.

basicData.name: Patria
basicData.title: Patria
basicData.body: This recently refurbished hostel is located right by the Puerta del Sol in an outstanding location, close to the Plaza Mayor, San Miguel Market, the Teatro Real Opera House, the Royal Palace and its gardens, and La Almudena Cathedral. All the rooms come with a television, air conditioning, heating, en-suite bathroom, and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Playa
basicData.title: Playa
basicData.body:
This small hostel is located in one of Madrid's most popular areas, the Barrio de las Letras, very close to the city's major museums: Prado, Thyssen, Caixa Forum and the Reina Sofía. It is also surrounded by cinemas, theatres, restaurants, and bars.

The hostel has 10 rooms, all with air conditioning, television, en-suite bathroom and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Hostal Miguel Ángel
basicData.title: Hostal Miguel Ángel
basicData.body: Friendly centrally located hostel with good links to the city's major tourist spots and business centres. The Barrio de Chueca is one of the liveliest districts in the city and is surrounded by shops, restaurants, theatres, and bars. All the rooms have air conditioning, flat screen TV, a small fridge, heating, and private bathroom with bathtub.

basicData.name: Mendoza
basicData.title: Mendoza
basicData.body: This hostel is located right on Gran Vía itself, one of the city's most famous streets, buzzing with entertainment and businesses, with cinemas and musicals, major shops and stores, and everything you need to have fun and be entertained. It offers simple comfortable rooms, all with a TV, heating, telephone, en-suite bathroom, and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Mayrit
basicData.title: Mayrit
basicData.body: This hostel is located on one of central Madrid’s most famous streets, Calle Arenal, an ideal spot for those wishing to visit the city without having to travel too far. Recently refurbished, this hostel has a lift, 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi connection, mini bar, television, fully fitted en-suite bathrooms, desk, air conditioning and heating.

basicData.name: Naranjos I
basicData.title: Naranjos I
basicData.body: Located right in the centre of Madrid, between the Plaza de Tirso de Molina and the Plaza de Jacinto Benavente, the Hostal Naranjos is an ideal option for travellers wishing to visit the city's most emblematic spots such as the district of Las Letras with its bars and restaurants, the Plaza de Santa Ana, the Plaza Mayor, the Puerta del Sol, and Gran Vía. The rooms offer a telephone, television, en-suite bathroom, hair dryer, air conditioning, heating, and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Marlasca
basicData.title: Marlasca
basicData.body: This hostel, located just a stone's throw from the Puerta del Sol, is an ideal option for those looking for comfortable reasonably priced accommodation in the city centre. The Marlasca is also just a short walk from Madrid's famous museums: the Thyssen-Bornemisza, the Prado, and the Reina Sofía. The rooms have a fully fitted bathroom, television, safe, telephone, air conditioning, heating, and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Los Perales
basicData.title: Los Perales
basicData.body:
Los Perales is located in the centre of Madrid in a pleasant and friendly street, just a few minutes away from Gran Vía, the city’s main touristic and commercial backbone. This guest house is a magnificent alternative for people who want to stay in the city centre at affordable prices in a perfect location, surrounded by cinemas, shops, theatres, cultural centres... It is a gay friendly guest house that is open to all customers. Although not set in the heart of Chueca, it is located ten minutes away from the neighbourhood by foot, allowing guests to enjoy everything Madrid’s gay neighbourhood has to offer whilst staying in a calmer environment.

Los Perales is equipped with all mod-cons to ensure a pleasant stay: central heating, televisions in every room, fan, hair dryer, 24-hour baggage storage, daily cleaning services and free Wifi. All rooms are very comfortable, with en suite bathrooms and exterior windows. It is a magnificent option to spend a few days in Madrid without spending a fortune on accommodation.

basicData.name: Guerra
basicData.title: Guerra
basicData.body: Reasonably priced hostel right in the centre, offering quality customer service for over two decades. It is located amidst the city's major museums, the Prado, the Thyssen and the Reina Sofía, as well as historic locations such as the Plaza Mayor, the Royal Palace, La Almudena Cathedral, and Los Jerónimos. The surrounding area also offers plenty of restaurants, shops, and theatres. The rooms come with a fully fitted bathroom, television, telephone, heating, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Ivor
basicData.title: Ivor
basicData.body: Hostel located in one of the most famous streets in central Madrid, Calle Arenal, which runs between Puerta del Sol and the Teatro Real Opera House. This central location means the city’s most emblematic spots are in walking distance for guests. It has been recently renovated and offers various services such as a lift, 24 hour reception, mini bar, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, fully fitted bathrooms and television.

basicData.name: Las Fuentes
basicData.title: Las Fuentes
basicData.body:
This two-star hostel is located in the heart of the city’s historic district, the famous Barrio de los Austrias. It is just a stone’s throw from tourist spots such as the Royal Palace, the Puerta del Sol, the Plaza Mayor and the Teatro Real Opera House. It is also close to some of Madrid’s oldest restaurants, such as Casa Lucío, Botín and Las Cuevas de Luis Candelas.

Hostal las Fuentes has 23 rooms all of which have a hairdryer, safe, air conditioning, central heating, television, telephone, alarm service, and high speed Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: El Catalán
basicData.title: El Catalán
basicData.body: A comfortable quiet hotel strategically located close to Gran Vía and the Plaza de Chueca, enabling its guests to satisfy their cultural, recreational and shopping needs. It has 20 rooms, all of which have a fully fitted bathroom, television, fridge, safe, heating, and air conditioning.

basicData.name: Conchita II
basicData.title: Conchita II
basicData.body: This hostel is located in the Opera district, next to the Teatro Real opera house and the Royal Palace, and close to Puerta del Sol and Gran Vía. It features Wi-Fi in public areas, heating, TV and luggage storage facilities.

basicData.name: El Pasaje
basicData.title: El Pasaje
basicData.body: Centrally located and comfortable, this hostel guarantees a good night’s rest by the Puerta del Sol. It occupies a historic building that has been fully renovated, combining period elements with cutting-edge features. All the rooms have air conditioning, radio, hair dryer, television, minibar, telephone, safe, and shower.

basicData.name: Faustino
basicData.title: Faustino
basicData.body: Quiet comfortable hostel located in the district of Las Letras, just a stone's throw from places such as the Prado Museum, the Puerta del Sol, and the Plaza Santa Ana. It offers single, double, triple and quadruple rooms with television, heating, and some with private bathroom.

basicData.name: Edreira
basicData.title: Edreira
basicData.body: Hostal Edreira is located within Madrid's art triangle, close to the city's major tourist spots and museums. Its rooms come with a fully fitted bathroom, telephone, television, heating and air conditioning.

basicData.name: Abami 2
basicData.title: Abami 2
basicData.body: Guesthouse located in Malasaña, close to many of the city´s attractions: museums, shops, restaurants and theatres. Its rooms offer a modern design and are fitted with a bathroom, air conditioning, heating and a balcony with views over the city.

basicData.name: Analina Rooms
basicData.title: Analina Rooms
basicData.body:
ANALINAROOMS Madrid is located in the historical city centre, near the Rastro flea market and just 50 metres from the Tirso de Molina underground station, halfway between Lavapiés and La Latina. The area couldn’t be more Madrilenian if it tried.

Analina Rooms are modern, simple Hostel/Serviced Apartments equipped with all mod-cons to ensure a pleasant stay. As well as its incredible location, with underground stations and bus stops nearby, there are also several carparks in the vicinity.

Rooms have fully-equipped large en suite bathrooms, and the services include breakfast, television, air-conditioning, wifi and safe boxes in rooms. This accommodation option is perfect for travellers who do not want to spend too much, but do expect a certain degree of comfort.

basicData.name: Domínguez
basicData.title: Domínguez
basicData.body: This hostel is located in the singular district of Chueca, a stone’s throw from Fuencarral, one of the busiest streets in town. It has simple, comfortable rooms, with everything guests may need to rest and relax: heating, air conditioning, satellite TV, Wi-Fi and fully fitted private bathroom.

basicData.name: Hostal Biarritz
basicData.title: Hostal Biarritz
basicData.body: Reasonably priced hostel located close to Puerta del Sol, which has been delivering quality customer service for over twenty years. This hostel boasts an ideal location, just a short walk from tourist spots such as the Prado Museum, the Plaza Mayor and the Royal Palace. Its central location means you can enjoy one of the city's liveliest and most interesting shopping and restaurant areas. The rooms are equipped with air conditioning, television, Wi-Fi, and private bathroom with bathtub.

basicData.name: Hostal del Pez Azul
basicData.title: Hostal del Pez Azul
basicData.body: Located in a quiet street close to Gran Vía, this hostel is an ideal base to enjoy the city's leisure and entertainment, since it is surrounded by shops, cinemas, and theatres. It is walking distance from some of the city's major tourist attractions such as the Thyssen Museum, the Prado, and the Reina Sofía. It offers comfortable rooms with a fully fitted bathroom, television, air conditioning, heating, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Hostal Chelo
basicData.title: Hostal Chelo
basicData.body: No frills reasonably priced hostel located close to Gran Vía, by the Chueca and Tribunal metro stations, in an area buzzing with tapas bars and restaurants. The rooms have a free Wi-Fi connection and LCD TV. The hostel also offers airport transfers and a left luggage facility.

basicData.name: Hispalense
basicData.title: Hispalense
basicData.body: Hostel located in the heart of Madrid's district of Los Austrias, close to the capital's major monuments such as the Royal Palace, the Plaza Mayor, the Teatro Real Opera House, and the Puerta del Sol.  All the rooms have their own toilet, air conditioning, safe, lift, heating, television, minibar and luggage closet.

basicData.name: Florida
basicData.title: Florida
basicData.body: A quiet, reasonably priced hostel located in the centre of Madrid, by the Plaza de Tirso de Molina. Some of the rooms have a private bathroom and other share a bathroom. This hostel offers excellent customer service and a central location. You can also rent rooms by the hour, an ideal option for travellers who need to rest for a while during the day.

basicData.name: Hostal Bahía Madrid
basicData.title: Hostal Bahía Madrid
basicData.body: Located by the Puerta del Sol, this reasonably priced hostel, with flamenco charm, provides an ideal base to explore Madrid's charms on foot. From here, you can go out for tapas in La Latina or the area of Huertas, go shopping in the different shopping districts such as Calle Preciados or Fuencarral, catch a play or a musical on Gran Vía, or enjoy the city's famous night life. The hostel also offers a series of extra services such as breakfast, car rental, bike and vespa hire, trips around Madrid, and tickets for events. There are three types of rooms available: some with a shower and balcony, others with a shared bathroom, and finally, 'beat the recession' rooms, all with television, free Wi-Fi, radio alarm, fan, heating, and safe.

basicData.name: Pensón Avantiss
basicData.title: Avantiss
basicData.body:
This small and convenient hostel is right in the middle of the Chueca neighbourhood, Madrid’s gay-friendly area. It boasts retro and functional interior design at a very affordable price.

Rooms include TV, air conditioning and fully equipped bathrooms. It’s the ideal place for a budget stay in the centre of town. Its location allows for easy access to the commercial and cultural hubs of the city, as well as taking strolls around Chueca.

basicData.name: Angelines
basicData.title: Angelines
basicData.body: Located in the district of Arguelles, very close to Ciudad Universitaria and around 10 minutes from Gran Vía. All the rooms have a bathroom, heating, television, and Wi-Fi access.

basicData.name: Alaska
basicData.title: Alaska
basicData.body: Small, welcoming hostel with a pleasant atmosphere located in the centre of Madrid, by the Puerta del Sol. It is also close to other tourist spots in the city, such as the Plaza de Santa Ana, the Prado Museum, the Thyssen, and the Reina Sofía museum. It has 7 rooms, some of which have a private bathroom and others with a shared shower and WC. All the rooms have air conditioning, heating, TV, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Dehesa Real
basicData.title: Dehesa Real
basicData.body:
A luxurious hotel located opposite the Ruber Internacional clinic in the north of Madrid, which has been designed combining classical traditions and a modern approach.

Traditional materials and forms have been reworked and used alongside more contemporary concepts, without rejecting natural elements like wood, leather, stone and metal with shiny finishes.

The design has focused on the coherence between the architecture of the building itself and the décor, arranging all the different elements to achieve a harmonious style that could be labelled Modern Classicism. Hotel Dehesa Real has a café and a restaurant service where guests can enjoy a simple gastronomic offer that adapts to all tastes.

basicData.name: Confortel Atrium
basicData.title: Confortel Atrium
basicData.body:
This new cosy, fully-equipped hotel in Madrid is the ideal accommodation for business or leisure tourism. The hotel is located in a very dynamic financial and business area in the eastern part of the capital.

Confortel Atrium has 195 fully-equipped rooms, all with air-conditioning, heating, TV, PC connections and mini bars, among other amenities. Confortel Atrium offers business clients a state-of-the-art Business Centre with five meeting rooms which can be used for meetings, conventions, conferences, events or seminars. Moreover, the hotel is conveniently connected, by public transport, to the city centre and Barajas Airport. The hotel also has a magnificent restaurant where guests can unwind after a long day's work.

basicData.name: NH Las Tablas
basicData.title: NH Las Tablas
basicData.body:
This four-star hotel offers the quality expected from the prestigious NH Hotels chain. It boasts a privileged location in the north of the city, near the A1 motorway, from where you can easily make your way by road to the city centre, the IFEMA trade fair park and Adolfo Suárez Madrid - Barajas International Airport.

This luxury hotel in Madrid is the ideal accommodation for business travellers who require a hotel that is well-connected to the Spanish capital. Top-range services and amenities guarantee a cosy stay: a Spa, a heated indoor pool, Turkish baths, aromatherapy showers and a gym.

Hotel NH Las Tablas has a charming café, a restaurant offering a delicious seasonal menu and fully equipped reception and conference halls. The reception is staffed around the clock to guarantee guests a pleasant stay in Madrid. Furthermore, the hotel has Wi-fi Internet in the whole building.

basicData.name: Compostela Suites
basicData.title: Compostela Suites
basicData.body:
This apartment complex is located near Adolfo Suárez Madrid - Barajas Airport. The 4 blocks spread out around an open central area with a range of open-air sports facilities, including an outdoor swimming pool.

Compostela Suites offer guests apartments with one bedroom, a fully-equipped bathroom, a living room-dining room and a kitchen. The hotel also has a restaurant-café, two outdoor swimming pools, a play area for children, a floodlit court for padel (a sport similar to tennis) and parking spaces. These amenities make Compostela Suites the ideal choice for short visits and an easy and accessible option for longer stays, either for leisure or business.

basicData.name: Apartamentos Madrid
basicData.title: Apartamentos Madrid
basicData.body: Here you will find tourist apartments with all services included and all comforts needed in the centre of Madrid. Located less than five minutes away from Puerta del Sol, where all distances are measured from in Spain, this is the perfect option for slightly longer stays. The apartments are equipped with kitchens, living rooms and all the services guests could require for the perfect trip.

basicData.name: Los Coronales
basicData.title: Los Coronales
basicData.body:
This small guest house located in Los Coronales de Barajas, a neighbourhood between Barajas Airport and the IFEMA trade fair park, offers family accommodation in an excellent setting.

The rooms are simple but fully-equipped, with exterior views. There is a shuttle service to and from the airport, and thanks to its location, travellers will be able to enjoy long walks in Juan Carlos I Park.

basicData.name: Villa Magna
basicData.title: Villa Magna
basicData.body:
Hotel Villa Magna is now more luxurious than ever; following a complete renovation, the property remains the perfect address for guests who require exclusive access to the city’s historic sites, museums and designer shops.

Based in the capital’s sophisticated Salamanca district, the 150 rooms and suites are spacious and combine old world charm with modern elegance. The Hotel Villa Magna’s four exclusive gourmet dining options give guests the chance to enjoy different styles of food all day, every day.

The Villa Magna restaurant, serves exciting new cuisine with a classic touch; the Lounge is ideal for breakfast, lunch or dinner; the Magnum Bar serves original cocktails and delicious tapas and the luxury Tse Yang restaurant specializes in exotic Cantonese dishes.

Covering more than 800 m2, the Hotel Villa Magna’s nine newly renovated meeting areas cater for a wide range of events. The five meeting rooms and La Galeria can be adapted to house all kinds events, from gala dinners, cocktails and weddings to corporate meetings and press conferences.

basicData.name: Hotel Eco Vía Lusitana
basicData.title: Hotel Eco Vía Lusitana
basicData.body:
Established in 2003, Egido Vía Lusitana is specially recommended for business travelers who might need to stay in an area connected to the southern part of the city or to one of the large population centres in the Community of Madrid, such as Leganés or Getafe.

The hotel has a private car park, is close to the most important ring roads (the M-40 and the M-45) and is equipped with excellent facilities for business travelers, including a conference hall and 65 rooms distributed on 4 floors. They all offer elegant double beds and are equipped with satellite and cable TV, a hi-fi and Internet connection.

Just a stone’s throw away you will find Tres Cruces Park, shared by the districts of La Latina and Carabanchel. This large green area offers a range of attractions such as an artificial lake, plenty of streams and bridges, an auditorium and several play areas for children.

basicData.name: Eurostars Madrid Tower
basicData.title: Eurostars Madrid Tower
basicData.body:
You’re more than likely to be overwhelmed by the stunning views from any of the 474 rooms in the Eurostars Madrid Tower. You’re surrounded by the Kio Towers, the Azca buildings... This is Madrid's most urban side in all its glory, as seen from one of the four towers in the Business Area now shaping the city's new skyline next to Paseo de la Castellana.

This five-star hotel has been designed specifically for business travellers and spreads out over 33 of the 50 floors in the Sacyr-Vallehermoso Tower, a skyscraper designed by architects Enrique Álvarez Sala and Carlos Rubio Carvajal standing 235 metres tall. The décor is as amazing as its outline – a continuous glass double skin façade – with a predominance of golden and metal tones in the rooms and black in the public areas, except for the lobby bar, which goes for a more daring combination of green and purple hues.

Some of the rooms are decorated with photographs of other famous tall buildings, such as the Empire State Building in New York and the Petronas Towers in Kuala Lumpur. The gourmet set high up on floor 31offers spectacular panoramic views at nightfall. But, for a really memorable experience, try having a swim or a sauna as you contemplate the city spread out beneath you.

basicData.name: Petit Palace Mayor-Plaza
basicData.title: Petit Palace Mayor-Plaza
basicData.body:
One of the city's most modern hotels stands in an unbeatable location: at one of the entrances to Plaza Mayor. Furthermore, it is only a few metres away from the Puerta del Sol, the heart of Madrid. It is also near points of interest and some of the city’s best museums, which visitors can get to by taking a pleasant stroll or with a quick trip by metro or bus from Puerta del Sol.

This luxurious establishment is the epitome of style and elegance. Accommodated in a typical old Madrid-style house, the design combines a traditional structure with state-of-the-art technology and commodities for guests. The décor has been designed meticulously, to create the style expected of this hotel chain.

basicData.name: Hostal Dos Naciones
basicData.title: Hostal Dos Naciones
basicData.body: The Hostal Dos Naciones is a welcoming hostel offering friendly service in the Barrio de las Letras, just a stone's throw from the Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor, and surrounded by cinemas, theatres, and museums. The rooms have television, heating, and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Hotel Julia
basicData.title: Hotel Julia
basicData.body:
Hotel Julia is located in Madrid’s business area and is easily accessible by car from the M40 and the A2 motorways. It is conveniently situated near the Municipal Conference Centre and the Juan Carlos I trade fair (IFEMA). It is only 15 minutes away from the city centre and just a few steps away from the "Ciudad Lineal" metro station, which is connected to an excellent transport network that allows easy access to the rest of the city.

It is appropriate for both business trips and leisure and tourism trips. The rooms offer exterior views. It has its own car park, and free Internet in all areas. The rooms have fully-equipped bathrooms, heating, air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Hilton Madrid Airport
basicData.title: Hilton Madrid Airport
basicData.body:
You could say that the Hilton Hotel chain has literally landed in Madrid, only a few minutes from the international airport. The name of this chain has always been synonymous with elegance and impeccable service, and this hotel is no exception.

Hilton Madrid Airport has become the hotel of choice for business travellers, for its design, architecture, services and amenities. The hotel has business meeting and conference facilities covering a total of 1,700 square metres, making it an ideal venue for holding meetings, conferences and conventions.

It offers King Deluxe rooms, King Guestrooms and Twin Guestrooms, all decorated in a contemporary style and equipped with wireless internet access, large windows and marble bathrooms. Its 69 m2 Executive suites have a separate living room with an LCD or plasma TV screen, as well as access to the hydrotherapy pool. The 138 m2 Presidential suite is enough to impress anyone. Other rooms types are the Deluxe, Executive and Relaxation, all of which come with various amenities.

The hotel is designed for both business and family trips. For the former it can provide audio-visual and office equipment, a business centre, conference rooms, modems, secretarial services, video messaging and video phone; for the latter, cots, kids’ menus, high chairs and family packages. To ensure full comfort, the hotel has a hydrotherapy pool and a gym at the Hilton Fitness by Precor®. It also offers various dining options: La Plaza; the Reserva, and the Forum Bar. Other services include currency exchange, multilingual staff, a furrier, room service and safe deposit boxes. Pets are allowed.

basicData.name: Maydrit
basicData.title: Maydrit
basicData.body:
This modern and functional hotel opened its doors in the summer of 2008. It is located in one of the commercial areas in north-eastern Madrid. It is very close to Adolfo Suárez Madrid - Barajas Airport and the trade fair ground of IFEMA, well connected to the city centre thanks to the closest metro station: “El Capricho”, just 100 meters from the hotel.

For those who have a car, the A2 and M40 roads will take you easily to any part of the city. The hotel includes all the services and facilities offered in any hotel of its kind. It is the perfect place for business travellers, but also for visitors who are in town for tourism. Additionally, the hotel has a good open air pool where you can relax after some sightseeing, shopping or business trip.

basicData.name: Apartamentos Ramón de la Cruz
basicData.title: Ramón de la Cruz Apartments
basicData.body: These apartments are located in the Salamanca district. All of them overlook the street and are very bright. They consist of a bedroom (with wardrobe, safe deposit-box and TV), living room with two spaces (a resting space with sofa and TV and a working space with desk, Internet access and telephone), kitchen (fully equipped with glass ceramic cooktop, oven, washing machine, dishwasher, microwaves and fridge) and full bathroom. There is also a top-floor apartment equipped with whirlpool bath and a terrace with fantastic views over the city. Other additional services are everyday cleaning service, continental breakfast included in the price and satellite TV, among others.

basicData.name: Holiday Inn Express Madrid Airport
basicData.title: Holiday Inn Express Madrid Airport
basicData.body:
Express by Holiday Inn Madrid Aeropuerto has just opened its doors. It is situated by the A2 road, near the Adolfo Suárez Madrid - Barajas airport and the fair grounds of IFEMA. The hotel is surrounded by the business parks of Coslada, San Fernando, Torrejón and Las Mercedes.

Its location, together with the characteristics of a hotel belonging to this chain, explains the fact that it is especially conceived for business travellers, without forgetting tourists. Functional and modern décor, bright and comfortable rooms to make customers feel at home even if they don’t stay for longer than one night.

basicData.name: Eco Alcalá Suites
basicData.title: Eco Alcalá Suites
basicData.body:
Eco Alcalá suites is superbly located in a residential, commercial and business area where you can find lots of shops, bars and restaurants. Just 50 meters from calle Alcalá and 600 meters from the metro station (Ciudad Lineal) which leads straight to the city centre. Just two minutes from the main M-30 and M-40 roads, within easy access of the liveliest areas in Madrid.

Their suite-style rooms are extremely comfortable and satisfy any need your family might have. Also, the hotel has services any good hotel would offer: café, bar, restaurant, fax and copying service, private dining room, buffet breakfast service, car park within the building, free gym in the adjoining building, safe-deposit box with capacity for laptops, laundry, dry cleaning, ironing, café terrace and cradle (upon request). Additionally, the hotel offers the possibility to enjoy a nice rooftop outdoor swimming pool with hammocks for sunbathing and views over Madrid’s skies.

basicData.name: Ibis Madrid Valentín Beato
basicData.title: Ibis Madrid Valentín Beato
basicData.body:
This hotel is located in the eastern part of the city, by the A2 road towards Barcelona and Zaragoza. There is a metro station 50 meters away (one minute walking); it is 15 minutes away from the city centre, 5 minutes away from the airport and 3 minutes away from IFEMA trade fair.

The Ibis chain aims to offer the best quality for a good price and make its customers feel at home. Rooms are simple and welcoming, modern and cosy, with a comfortable bed and a functional bathroom. Their Café is open all night and offers good food options and good quality drinks: wine, beer, pasta, tapas, roasted meat, pizza, etc.

basicData.name: Suites Viena
basicData.title: Suites Viena
basicData.body: Placed right in the middle of the district of Argüelles in Madrid, surrounded by the streets of Gran Vía, Princesa, Ferraz and Paseo Rosales, this newly built hotel is just a few meters away from Plaza de España and Palacio de Oriente, close to the main leisure and tourist area of Hapsburg Madrid. Modern and avant-garde suites/studios with all the necessary elements for the best comfort: air conditioning, mini-bar, kitchen and Internet access.

basicData.name: Hostal Colors Host
basicData.title: Hostal Colors Host
basicData.body: As we can deduce from its name, colour is very important in this hostel, as each of the rooms has a different colour. Located in the neighbourhood of Chueca, next to Gran Vía, it offers double rooms provided with TV, Internet access, central heating, air conditioning and private bathroom. They also have a 24-hour reception service and free luggage storage service. The rooms are light, in a modern and functional decorating style. The hostel has been renovated and occupies the fourth floor of a building equipped with a lift.

basicData.name: Adriá Santa Ana
basicData.title: Adriá Santa Ana
basicData.body: Hostel located in Madrid's historic centre, just a stone's throw from Puerta del Sol and the Plaza Mayor. The rooms offer: private bathroom, air conditioning, central heating, telephone, TV, fridge, safety deposit box, and free WiFi.

basicData.name: Albergue Juvenil Municipal
basicData.title: Albergue Juvenil Municipal
basicData.body:
Madrid’s Municipal Youth Hostel, inaugurated in 2007, is one of the most modern of its kind in Europe and designed to cater for both national and international youth tourism.

Its spacious rooms sleep between 4 and 6 people (some of them are wheelchair accessible) and are equipped with bunk beds, individual reading lamps, heating, AC, full bathroom, lockers with security locks and entrance door with magnetic card access. Bed linen and breakfast are included. Other additional services and facilities include free Internet access, optional towel rental service, laundry service, 24-hour reception desk, billiards and board games, dining room, living room and gym (with exercise bikes), etc. The hostel has modern furnishings and a young atmosphere.

basicData.name: Barceló Castellana Norte
basicData.title: Barceló Castellana Norte
basicData.body:
This innovative and functional hotel, recently built and located in a fast growing business area, is just five minutes from the Juan Carlos I Trade Fair complex (IFEMA) and three minutes from El Corte Inglés Sanchinarro department store.

The rooms are light, comfortable and soundproof. Like the bedrooms, the meeting rooms are bright and airy, with capacity for more than 300 people.

basicData.name: Hostal la Fontana
basicData.title: Hostal la Fontana
basicData.body:
Right next to Madrid’s Gran Vía, La Fontana Hostel occupies the first floor of a building dating from 1884. It has both single and double rooms with private bathroom, heating, telephone, background music, electric fans and TV.

It has been newly renovated and it is very well insulated from external noise and weather conditions thanks to its double glazed windows. It also has a pleasant inner courtyard. It is decorated in a simple, functional, comfortable and modern style. The staff are well qualified to handle foreign tourists as they speak Spanish, Italian, English, Arabic and Russian.

basicData.name: Room Mate Laura
basicData.title: Room Mate Laura
basicData.body:
Room Mate is an innovative approach to accommodation. The main objective here is to make you feel at your best friend’s house, a welcoming, comfortable and modern place.

The idea came when three friends (Kike, Carlos and Gorka) were having a cup of coffee and talking about the fact that there were no hotels in Madrid that met their needs. Then they wondered where they would like to stay if they travelled to a city like Madrid and they concluded that they would look for somewhere central, with an original interior decor and affordable prices, without the additional unnecessary services provided by many hotels, and with informal, personal service. They went on to open their first hotel: Room Mate Mario, right in the centre of Madrid, near Teatro Real.

Laura, who lives in Plaza de las Descalzas (because everything is personalised here), offers 36 apartments (standard, duplex, duplex deluxe and penthouse) with breakfast service until midday included in the price. All the apartments are decorated in a colourful avant-garde style, inspired by New York lofts. They are equipped with kitchenette, safe deposit-box, minibar, free Internet Wi-Fi access, plasma television with DVD, air conditioning, heating, etc. Other services and facilities are laundry and dry cleaning services, parking garage, meeting room rental, wake-up service and car rental, among others.

Apart from Laura and Mario, this chain of hotels and urban apartments with proper names has several other establishments in the city, all with proper names. As we said, it’s like staying at your friends house.

basicData.name: Hostal Puerta del Sol
basicData.title: Hostal Puerta del Sol
basicData.body:
From its name, it is not difficult to deduce where this hostel is located: right in the heart of Madrid, in Puerta del Sol, where the streets of Alcalá, Arenal, Montera, San Jerónimo and Carretas meet.

Guests can get everywhere from here: they can walk to most tourist attractions, shopping areas, restaurants and nightclubs or, if they decide to use public transport, they will find it right next to the hostel (metro and bus stops, taxis and so on).

This hostel is especially conceived for gay customers. The hostel has rooms with en suite shower or fully equipped bathroom, balcony or terrace facing one of the most famous squares in Madrid. Pleasant and welcoming atmosphere.

basicData.name: Pizarro
basicData.title: Pizarro
basicData.body:
This hostel is located right in the heart of Madrid, next to the Chueca neighbourhood.
