It occupies one of the few modernist buildings in the city, which was once the head office of the newspaper El Correo Español. Its façade is in the neo-Gothic style with a modernist composition and was designed by architect Mauricio Jalvo Millán.

Pizarro is a gay friendly hostel and everybody is made to feel welcome. It is based on the principles of tolerance and respect, and aims to provide comfort and an inclusive atmosphere. It has single, double and triple rooms with full bathroom, TV, telephone, safe deposit-box, minibar, everyday cleaning service, electronic door locks and other services and facilities such as two lounges, satellite and digital TV, free Internet Wi-Fi access, laundry, wake-up service, central heating, etc. The decor is modern and functional and the rooms are comfortable and bright.

basicData.name: Room Mate Oscar
basicData.title: Room Mate Oscar
basicData.body:
Óscar describes himself as a night owl, cosmopolitan, modern and extroverted. Meet your new Room Mate, located close to Gran Vía, between calle Fuencarral and calle Barquillo, in the bright Plaza de Vázquez de Mella. An ideal partner for lovers of the arts, new trends, the endless beat of the city, gastronomy, fashion, music and so on...

Tomás Alía is responsible for the decor in this new hotel, one of the most avant-garde in the chain, which set up its first premises in Madrid a few years ago with a new hotel concept based on “one to one” treatment and has now opened several others since then.

The rooms, which come in all shapes and colours, are decorated in lively tones and equipped with contemporary furniture in a youthful style, with a modern, bright atmosphere. The rooms are also fully equipped with the latest technology and comforts. The pool is on a fashionable rooftop terrace with minimalist décor and Balinese sunbeds, the perfect spot to spend a day in summer, enjoy an aperitif, eat a light brunch, have coffee, relax on one of the beds and cool off with a refreshing dip.

basicData.name: Albergue Internacional Posada de Huertas
basicData.title: Albergue Internacional Posada de Huertas
basicData.body:
This youth hostel is in an excellent location in the Literary Quarter, in an old “corrala” (a traditional building typical of Madrid) dating from the early 19th century.

Posada de Huertas is the perfect place to stay for young foreign visitors. As a youth hostel, it follows the guidelines of any establishment of its kind, which means that they offer shared dormitory-style rooms with single and double modules so that residents can have some degree of privacy. The rooms are provided with single beds, light, socket, lockers and air conditioning (cold and warm).

Services provided: breakfast (included in the price), Internet access, free use of the communal kitchen, laundry, luggage room, 24-hour reception service, recreation rooms with TV, telephone and fax, tourist information, information about trips and bike parking area. Credit cards are accepted and the staff are bilingual.

basicData.name: Apartamentos Juan Bravo
basicData.title: Apartamentos Juan Bravo
basicData.body:
Next to Madrid’s golden mile, right in the heart of the Salamanca District, you’ll find this ten-floor building with apartments and studios. The front of the building faces Calle Juan Bravo and it has an interior garden area.

Services offered include safe deposit-box, Wi-Fi access, kitchenette, telephone, satellite TV and the like. They also have a swimming pool and solarium, parking area, a business centre with offices (from one to four air-conditioned workstations with piped music), conference rooms (for meetings, courses, seminars) equipped with everything you need for professional and business activities.

basicData.name: Cat's Hostel
basicData.title: Cat's Hostel
basicData.body:
For those on a tighter budget, Cat’s Hostel may be just what you’re looking for: somewhere clean, comfortable, centrally located, in a lively and bustling area.

The accommodation ranges from rooms with private bathroom to dormitories sleeping 4 to 14 people with a shared bathroom – something to suit everyone’s pocket. All rooms are comfortable, modern and clean.

At Cat’s, breakfast is included in the price and you’ll find a friendly atmosphere, great for meeting people from all over the world. Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout the hostel and they also provide a towel hire service.

basicData.name: Aparthotel Amador de los Ríos
basicData.title: Aparthotel Amador de los Ríos
basicData.body:
This Aparthotel has the advantage of being on a quiet street in the middle of one of Madrid’s most famous tourist areas. From there, you can easily reach major tourist attractions like Plaza de Colón, Paseo de la Castellana, the commercial area of the Salamanca District and Retiro Park.

Aparthotel Amador de los Ríos offers 29 studio-suites (double rooms) consisting of a living room with bathroom and kitchen. Services and facilities include private telephone, TV, room service, air conditioning, heating, internet access, laundry service, foreign exchange service, fax and photocopies, garage, car rental and travel agency. Other additional facilities include a café and a swimming pool. The apartments are comfortable and functional. A lovely outdoor swimming pool welcomes clients for a relaxing dip after a day of tourism in the city.

basicData.name: Residencias de Postgraduados Pío XI y León XIII
basicData.title: Pío XI y León XIII Postgraduate residence halls
basicData.body:
These men’s (Pío XI) and women's (León XIII) residence halls are run by the Foundation Pablo VI, created by the Cardinal Ángel Herrera Oria in 1968, erected by the Holy See and recognized as a religious and charity-educational foundation by the State. It remains open all year round and it is conceived for people preparing competitive examinations, postgraduate students and students involved in research projects.  Both are located in the University area.

They have single rooms with bathroom, Internet WiFi access, everyday cleaning service, laundry, dining hall and cafeteria (only the room is included in the price, although you can buy tickets for lunch and dinner), medical service… Other facilities offered are library, newspaper room, study rooms, music room, conference room, IT room, photography lab, auditorium (cinema and theatre), gym, sports court, etc. They organize study, cultural, social, sports and leisure activities. They also have a chapel and a university pastoral.

basicData.name: Aparthotel El Madroño
basicData.title: Aparthotel El Madroño
basicData.body:
El Madroño was built in 1997 and fully refurbished in 2006. It is superbly located in the Salamanca District, very close to a metro stop. Its six floors contain 66 rooms of varying types: double rooms, single occupancy double rooms, twin rooms, twin rooms with an extra bed, single rooms and triple rooms.

All rooms are spacious and light and are provided with air conditioning, TV, telephone, heating, lounge room, kitchenette and full bathroom. Other hotel services include Wi-Fi internet access, laundry, ironing, automatic wake-up system, radio, coffee-maker, kettle, meeting rooms, secure parking, restaurant and garden.

basicData.name: Apartamentos Principe 11
basicData.title: Apartamentos Principe 11
basicData.body:
Situated between Puerta del Sol and Plaza de las Cortes, Apartamentos Príncipe 11 offers studios, suites and family apartments. It has a total of 22 studios (interior and exterior) consisting of a 40 m2 room with a double bed or twin beds, kitchenette with fridge, ceramic hob and basic household items.

All ten apartments have a room with a double bed, a living room with a sofa-bed, kitchenette with fridge, glass-ceramic hob, basic household items and full bathroom. Both suites are spread over two floors. One of them has a bedroom with double bed and a full bathroom; the other has a living room with a sofa-bed, a bathroom, kitchen with fridge, ceramic hob and basic household items, an office and a balcony-solarium.

The two family apartments consist of three bedrooms (one with a double bed and the other with single beds), living-room with sofa-bed and 20” TV, kitchen with fridge, ceramic hob, basic household items and full bathroom. There is an everyday cleaning and rubbish collection service. The apartments are only a few metres from Puerta del Sol, right in the middle of the historic Literary Quarter and close to the city’s major tourist attractions. It is a perfect place for both business travellers and family holidays.

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Cardenal Spinola
basicData.title: Residencia Universitaria Cardenal Spinola
basicData.body: This women’s hall of residence is managed by the Order of Slaves of the Immaculate Heart of Mary. They offer full board (although no meals are served on Sundays) and lodging in single rooms with washbasin and a laundry service is included in the price. Showers and toilets are shared. Other facilities are a library, assembly hall and TV room. The selection process takes the students’ academic record into account and there is an interview process involving both students and their parents. The hall of residence is closed during August and is very close to the University Campus.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Aquinas
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Aquinas
basicData.body:
Colegio Mayor Santo Tomás de Aquino (Aquinas) is an educational institution attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid founded by the religious Order of Preachers (Dominicans): an Order of great tradition in university, recognized by the State in 1945. The project for the premises of this residence hall was awarded the Architecture National Prize in 1956 due to the peculiar characteristics of the building, a work by Jorge Díez, architect and former resident.

Located in the University zone, this men’s residence hall offers single rooms with breakfast, lunch and dinner included (Sundays and holidays also), room cleaning, weekly washing and ironing, Internet access, etc. Other facilities and services provided are study room, library, computer room, lecture hall, two group work rooms, electronics and photography labs and different sports facilities (sports court, swimming pool, frontón, seven-a-side football on grass, two paddle courts).

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Ximénez de Cisneros
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Ximénez de Cisneros
basicData.body:
This is the oldest residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid. Since its foundation in 1943, many generations of students from all over Spain and also from other countries have lived here, including several current important figures in different professional areas.

The rooms offered in this men’s residence hall are single with breakfast, lunch and dinner included everyday, cleaning and laundry service. The central block of the building is occupied by the common rooms, such as study rooms, computer rooms, dining hall, cafeteria, music rooms, cinema, library, etc.

The residents themselves, together with the management department, define and organize the activities of the residence hall through different “Cultural Societies”. These Societies deal with subjects like Music (with modern and classic music rooms), Photography, Electronics and IT, Reading, Cultural Initiatives, Video, Cinema and Sports. Among these activities they include a “tuna” (musical group made up of university students) and a theatre company. They have an important rugby team which has achieved many successes in both university and federal competitions.

basicData.name: Club Universitario
basicData.title: Club Universitario
basicData.body:
Club Universitario was founded in 1992 in Madrid as a residence hall for university students, post graduate students, students preparing competitive examinations and interns. The main objective of this Club is to create a good atmosphere so that residents can achieve success in their studies.

They offer single and double rooms with breakfast, lunch and dinner included all year round, weekly washing and ironing of clothes, everyday room cleaning, weekly change of bed linen, everyday change of towels, telephone and Internet access. Common services and facilities: study room, TV room, living room (video, DVD, digital TV), fax and copying.

 It is a mixed residence hall located in one of the most central areas in Madrid, in the Chamberí neighbourhood. Club Universitario , accommodation Madrid, student residences Madrid, Chamberí

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Jaime del Amo
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Jaime del Amo
basicData.body:
This university residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid is managed by the Claretian Missionaries. The residence hall owes its name to its founder, Jaime del Amo, who wanted to perpetuate the memory of his father, Gregorio del Amo. It was founded in 1967 and officially inaugurated in 1968. The project, by the architect Luis Blanco Soler, was awarded the Architecture National Prize.

The residence attempts to achieve its goals through common life and different cultural, religious and sports activities, in which resident students are directly involved. These activities are organized in two different categories: life-together and studies (science, liberal arts, engineering, architecture) aiming to promote cooperation among all the residents.

All the rooms are single and include laundry service. Some of the facilities offered are library, study rooms, assembly hall, chapel, lounge, TV and video room, gym, swimming pool, sports court, café…

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Gómez-Pardo
basicData.title: Residencia Universitaria Gómez-Pardo
basicData.body:
This is a mixed-sex residence hall managed by the Gómez-Pardo Foundation, attached to Universidad Politécnica de Madrid. It is especially aimed at students studying at the Escuela de Minas (school of mining engineering) who come from outside Madrid, although students from other faculties are also accepted for the remaining places. The hall of residence is in the Chamberí neighbourhood.

Gómez-Pardo Foundation is a private non-profit institution founded by José Gómez Pardo and devoted to education, technical investigation and cultural activities. Its president is the principal of the Superior Technical School of Mining Engineering of Madrid.

Accommodation consists of single rooms with bathroom and Internet access, cleaning service from Monday to Friday (except holidays) and shared washing machine/tumble dryer (coin-operated). The monthly charge includes the room, meals (lunch and dinner) and breakfast. Other services and facilities offered are daily medical service, TV room, video room and music room, library, study room with Internet access and cafeteria. There are no entry and exit time restrictions. Cultural and sports activities are organised throughout the academic year. Rooms can be booked during the summer months.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Santiago Galas Arce
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Santiago Galas Arce
basicData.body:
The Hispanic-Mexican residence hall Santiago Galas Arce, run by the catholic religious congregation of the Legion of Christ, is attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid and located close to the Universtiy district.

It is a men’s residence hall which offers single rooms with private full bathroom, laundry and dining hall. Some of the facilities provided are café, classic music, modern music club, photography club, library, computer room, cinema, study rooms, electronics room and languages room. Their sports facilities include swimming pool, frontón, indoor court, gym, table tennis room…

Apart from the written application, the requirements for admission include an interview with the applicant and his parents or tutors, as well as the approval of the Residence Council. It closes at Christmas, Easter and during summer. In September the premises are available for external activities.

basicData.name: Aparthotel Th la Florida
basicData.title: Aparthotel Th la Florida
basicData.body:
Aparthotel Th La Florida is located in a business area surrounded by gardens with direct access to the Nacional VI main and within easy reach of the M-40 motorway. It is close to one of the fastest growing commercial areas in Madrid, near the railway station and shopping and leisure centres. This ideal location makes it the perfect place to stay for business travellers.

Rooms are provided with wireless Internet access (Wi-Fi), desk, iron and ironing board, wake-up call service, telephone and free satellite TV and radio. The aparthotel also offers a laundry service, lounge, daily newspapers, fax and photocopying, private parking area and car rental.

basicData.name: Aparthotel Th Aravaca
basicData.title: Aparthotel Th Aravaca
basicData.body:
Aparthotel Th Aravaca is in a strategic location in Madrid with easy access to the city’s main roads (Nacional VI and M-40), very close to the railway station and to major shopping and leisure centres like El Corte Inglés and Sexta Avenida. The aparthotel has rooms, one-bedroomed apartments with living room and fully-equipped kitchen, plus two-bedroomed apartments with living room and fully-equipped kitchen.

All rooms have air conditioning, Wi-Fi internet access, desk, iron and ironing board, wake-up call service, suites, telephone and free satellite TV and radio. Hotel services include wireless internet access, private parking area, car rental, café-bar, laundry, office, etc. Due to its location and characteristics, the accommodation is perfect for business travellers and/or long stays.

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Santísima Trinidad
basicData.title: Residencia Universitaria Santísima Trinidad
basicData.body:
All the residence halls managed by the Congregation of the Sisters of the Trinity were created aiming to meet the conviviality and educational needs of young girls living far away from their homes, who are looking for accommodation, guidance, work or a better job. Breakfast, lunch and dinner (except weekends dinner) are included in the price. Other services and facilities offered are laundry and ironing, telephone and Internet, study room, games room, chapel, gardens and tennis court. This Congregation has three more residence halls in Madrid

Rooms:

Total number of rooms: 35

basicData.name: Aparthotel Convención Barajas
basicData.title: Aparthotel Convención Barajas
basicData.body:
Apartotel Convención Barajas is located in Alameda de Osasuna, a quiet residential area in Madrid. It is just next to the road N-II, very close to Ifema (Juan Carlos I Fairground in Parque de las Naciones) and Barajas International Airport. Well connected to the city centre. The hotel has 50 m2 apartments fully equipped, distributed in two connected five-floor buildings. Each apartment has living/dining room with sofa bed, satellite TV and telephone; bedroom with interactive TV and satellite TV, electronic safe deposit box and telephone; fully equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave oven and household items upon request; bathroom with hairdryer; air conditioning and security door with magnetic lock. Among other services and facilities provided, we must highlight laundry and cleaning services, meeting room suitable for up to 20 people, parking area for up to 100 vehicles, garden area and free airport-hotel-fairground transport.

Total number of apartments: 95

basicData.name: Aparthotel G3 Galeón
basicData.title: Aparthotel G3 Galeón
basicData.body:
The apartments are in the northern part of the city, in one of the major commercial areas. Its location and characteristics make this the perfect accommodation option for business, holidays and long stays.

Apartahotel Quo Galeón has 38 outward-facing, light, spacious apartments (35 m2) divided into two areas and featuring a bedroom, separate living room, kitchenette, full bathroom, satellite TV, telephone and free wireless Internet access.

All the apartments are provided with air conditioning and heating and a fully-equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave, coffee maker, ceramic hob and basic household items. The superior-type apartments also have a spacious terrace. There are also several rooms for business meetings.

basicData.name: Tagaste Madrid
basicData.title: Tagaste Madrid
basicData.body:
University halls of residence located in Madrid's Salamanca district, very close to the Goya, Príncipe de Vergara, Lista and Diego de León metro stops. It also has good bus links to different university campuses and faculties such as ICADE, ICAI, CEU, Cardenal Cisneros, IEB, Politécnica, Fundación Villanueva, etc. The halls are also close to the city's major shopping areas and cultural points of interest as they are located in the centre of Madrid.

Tagaste Madrid offers modern, fully refurbished facilities, to provide a comfortable and pleasant stay. These Halls offer single and double rooms with bathroom, air conditioning, TV and internet connection via cable or Wi-Fi, with a weekly cleaning service.
They have a 24 hour reception service, CCTV in communal areas, two libraries, two study halls, an assembly hall, solarium, gym, jacuzzi, sauna, dining room, two terraces, two TV rooms, laundry, computer room, garage. 
The Halls also offer rooms for daily stays and for groups of students.

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Presentación de María
basicData.title: Residencia Universitaria Presentación de María
basicData.body: This is a women’s hall of residence in the Chamberí district, run by the Congregation of the Presentation of Mary. They offer single rooms with washbasin and shower. Toilets are shared. On Sundays only breakfast is served. The hall has a library, TV room and laundry service. Only university students are admitted and references are needed. It remains closed during summer.

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Verbo Encarnado
basicData.title: Residencia Universitaria Verbo Encarnado
basicData.body: This women’s hall of residence is run by the religious community of Sisters of the Incarnate Word and provides single rooms with bathroom and breakfast, lunch and dinner included in the price. Other facilities and services are study room, TV room and launderette. A personal interview is required prior to admission. The hall of residence is in the Chamberí neighbourhood and has good connections to the university campus and other academic centres in Madrid. It is closed during July and August and at Easter and Christmas.

basicData.name: Aparthotel Quo Eraso
basicData.title: Aparthotel Quo Eraso
basicData.body:
This aparthotel built in 1993 offers outward facing studio-style soundproof apartments, fully equipped with kitchenette, fridge, microwave and household items. All rooms feature air conditioning, full bathroom, satellite TV, telephone and free wireless Internet access.

Its location in the Salamanca District makes it the perfect place to stay for business travellers, family holidays or long stays. Other services and facilities offered include car rental, florist service, dry cleaning and laundry service, parking area, terrace/solarium. Practical and functional.

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Patrocinio de San José
basicData.title: Residencia Universitaria Patrocinio de San José
basicData.body:
This women’s university residence hall managed by the Congregation of the Servants of St. Joseph is in a central part of Madrid, near Tribunal. Accommodation consists of single and double rooms with bathroom and full board (breakfast, lunch and dinner included in the price), except on Sundays and public holidays. They also have a laundry service, library and TV room.

The criterion for being selected is student record. No references are required. The residence hall is closed during July and August, Easter and Christmas.

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Ciudad Escolar
basicData.title: Residencia Universitaria Ciudad Escolar
basicData.body:
Ciudad Escolar is a mixed-sex residence hall depending on the regional education and culture ministry (Consejería de Educación y Cultura de la Comunidad de Madrid) and attached to Universidad Autónoma de Madrid. It has single and double rooms plus two rooms adapted for disabled students. The hall of residence is is El Pardo next to the Universidad Autónoma campus.

Services include everyday cleaning of common rooms, dining hall with self-service (including on public holidays), room cleaning and laundry. Facilities also include are heated swimming pool, sports centre, sports fields, library, computer room, assembly hall, theatre and cinema. In addition, they organize a series of cultural and leisure activities throughout the year. The hall of residence is closed at Christmas, Easter and in August.

basicData.name: Espahotel Plaza Basílica
basicData.title: Espahotel Plaza Basílica
basicData.body:
This hotel is located in one of the most important business areas in Madrid (Azca), which makes it the perfect choice for business travellers. It is also near Paseo de la Castellana and it is surrounded by some of the city’s most representative examples of modernist architecture and close to different shopping and cultural areas.

Simple, functional and elegant interior décor. They offer eight deluxe suites (two bedrooms, separate living room, bathroom and private kitchen), 48 suites (one bedroom, separate living room, bathroom and private kitchen) and 24 studios (ten single rooms and fourteen double rooms with bathroom and private kitchen). The hotel is also provided with laundry service, heating and air conditioning in every room, telephone, room-service, safe deposit-box, foreign exchange, fax and copying, car rental, travel agency, etc.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Santillana
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Santillana
basicData.body:
The residence hall Santillana is attached to Universidad Autónoma de Madrid and is located in the residential area of Mirasierra. It opened its doors in 1976, aiming to provide university students with an integral education in every area: professional, social, spiritual and human. Every aspect of this men’s residence hall reflects a Christian conception of life.

The spiritual and religious education is entrusted to the Prelature of Opus Dei, an organization of the Roman Catholic Church. They offer single rooms with full bathroom, with shower and washbasin and without bathroom (shared bathrooms provided along the corridors). Breakfast, lunch and dinner included everyday, including Sundays and holidays. Weekly dry cleaner and laundry services.

Some of the facilities offered are library, study room, tennis court, sports court and swimming pool. They also organize different cultural activities: talks and gatherings, medicine club, writing and oratory courses, stock exchange courses, Christian education activities, or volunteer work.

basicData.name: Residencia Universitaria Erasmo
basicData.title: Erasmus University Residence
basicData.body:
This residence hall is located in Cantoblanco Campus and one can easily get to the city centre by train and by bus. Residencia Universitaria Erasmo was inaugurated in 2004. Since September 2008, new premises, services and places are available in a new adjacent building.

This is a residence hall for students at Universidad Autónoma de Madrid during the academic year. They have single rooms with kitchen, single rooms with shared kitchen and double rooms with kitchen and all of them have the following services: private bathroom, telephone, heating, Internet access and satellite TV. They also have special rooms for the disabled.

Common facilities: gym, laundrette, car park, study room TV and DVD, etc. They also offer the possibility of short stays or rooms for small groups. In the summer the whole premises are available for groups and general public to stay for some days or weeks. Open all year round.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor César Carlos
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor César Carlos
basicData.body:
Colegio Mayor César Carlos is a self-managed postgraduate institution, so you need to have a degree or some equivalent in order to be admitted. It is situated in the University District, and well connected to the rest of Madrid and surrounding areas.

The fact that it is a self-managed institution means that all residents know and assume the needed functions of organization, control and maintenance. Staff is made up of resident students and the quorum of election of applicants for rector committee.

They offer single rooms; breakfast, lunch and dinner included (except Saturdays), laundry, gym and swimming pool among other services. They also organize many cultural activities: parties, lectures, debates, etc. It is especially created to for people studying to be a university professor and for those preparing a competitive examination. You will live in an atmosphere characterized by tolerance, solidarity, generosity and mutual respect. These are the values they commonly call ‘César spirit’.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Casa do Brasil
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Casa do Brasil
basicData.body:
La casa do Brasil is attached to Universidad Complutense and its purpose is to spread other cultures’ language, culture and civilization. The construction of this residence hall started in 1960, after having signed the Cultural Agreement between Brazil and Spain, yet in force. This is also the year when the capital of Brazil, Rio de Janeiro, was changed to Brasilia. The Hall is located in a quiet university area near Moncloa and the Parque del Oeste.

Admissions are reserved for university students, postgraduates (enrolled at University) and candidates for competitive examinations. Married residents are admitted as long as at least one of the partners fulfils one of the previous requirements, yet their children won’t be accepted. There are single rooms with bathroom, hot water and all the furniture needed for rest and study: bed, desk, chair, built-in wardrobe, air conditioning and private telephone.

Cleaning service from Monday to Friday (except holidays). Washing and ironing of a limited quantity of personal clothes. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included everyday except Sundays. Common facilities: library, TV room, music room, reading room, gym…

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Marqués de la Ensenada
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Marques de la Ensenada
basicData.body:
This mixed residence hall was founded and is directly run by the Association Hidalgos a Fuero de España. This association is a member of Universidad de Madrid created for educational purposes. Both, its facilities and the activities they organize are conceived for the religious, cultural, politic, sports and social education of resident students.

They offer single and double rooms with breakfast, lunch and dinner included (also on holidays), everyday cleaning service, laundry or first-aid kit among other services. Among other facilities, they have café, newspaper library, library, audio library, computer room, photography room, video and cinema room, TV room, music room, chapel, parking area and sports facilities (indoor football, handball, basketball, volley-ball, tennis, swimming pool…).

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Moncloa
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Moncloa
basicData.body:
Moncloa is a men’s residence hall located in the University district, attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid and founded in 1943 with the support of San Josemaría Escrivá (Founder of the Prelature of Opus Day) in a Christian education project.

The residence follows an educational project inspired in the Christian religion. They offer accommodation and a comprehensive programme of cultural activities and academic and vocational guidance as a complement to university studies. They offer single and triple rooms furnished with desk, shelves, wardrobe and locker with everyday cleaning service (except Sundays). Bed linen and towels are provided by the residence. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included (from Monday to Sunday). Weekly dry-cleaner and laundry service.

Some of the facilities offered by the centre are two study rooms/libraries, lounge, computer room, WiFi access in the common areas, sports facilities like courts and swimming pool, chapel and mass service, assembly hall, etc.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Elías Ahúja
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Elías Ahúja
basicData.body:
Colegio Mayor Elías Ahúja is a residence hall, inaugurated in 1969, attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid. The Elías Ahúja Foundation –owner of the premises- delegated its management to the Order of Saint Augustine, the religious institution which runs the residence hall since its foundation. This men’s institution aims to provide accommodation and complementary education to university students through sports, culture and solidarity.

They have single and double rooms provided with telephone and Internet access, washbasin and shower (some of them with full bathroom). Breakfast, lunch and dinner are included as well as weekly laundry service. Some of the facilities offered are conference room, study rooms, reading room, electronics room, photography room, architecture room, gym, sports court, library (with more than 8.000 books), chapel, music room, TV and video room and a theatre fitting more than 500 people equipped with the best technical facilities to perform their own plays, watch theatre performances or for film projections.

basicData.name: Espahotel los Jerónimos
basicData.title: Espahotel Los Jerónimos
basicData.body:
Aparthotel Los Jerónimos belongs to the Espahotel chain offers apartments conveniently located next to Retiro Park, near all the main tourist sites of the capital.

It offers different apartment-suite types: double (double bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living/dining room, and balcony), triple (double bedroom, single bedroom, two bathrooms, kitchen, living/dining room, and balcony) and quad (two double bedrooms, two bathrooms, kitchen, living/dining room, and balcony).

All apartments have air conditioning, individual heating, TV and telephone, room service, garage…They also offer services like laundry, fax and copying, car rental, travel agency or safe deposit box, among others.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Argentino Nuestra Señora de Luján
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Argentino Nuestra Señora de Luján
basicData.body:
This Nuestra Señora de Luján residence hall accepts graduate students taking post graduate courses (masters, specialized courses), research courses or any other cultural or academic activity of any duration in Spain. Argentinian students have priority. In case there was any free vacancy; university students of other nationalities would be admitted.

This residence is situated in the University zone with easy access to many bodies and faculties connected to the Universidad Computense de Madrid.

All rooms (single and double) are facing the residence interior courtyard. They are provided with heating, air conditioning, wardrobes, shelves, washbasin and 24-hour wireless Internet access. Cleaning service from Monday to Friday. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included from Monday to Saturday (only breakfast on Sunday).

Common facilities include library-study room, computer room, printer, Spanish daily press, TV room, washing machine and dryer and public telephone, among others. Open in summer.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Isabel de España
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Isabel de España
basicData.body:
Colegio Mayor Isabel de España opened its doors in 1956 and was a women’s residence hall for many years. Since the academic year 2000-2001, men are also admitted. Attached to Universidad Complutense, its purpose is to achieve a comprehensive education of resident students through complementary educational activities like lectures, courses, seminars and the creation of cultural artistic and sports groups. It is located in the University area, in the centre of the student residential area.

The requirements to apply for a place are the following: you must be a university student in a public or private university in Comunidad de Madrid; you must have an excellent student record. The residence is structured in 10 communities of 16 students each. All rooms are single with breakfast, lunch and dinner included, except Sunday’s breakfast and dinner.

Colegio Mayor Isabel de España has a limited number of places for post graduates and professors. They offer rooms for students’ relatives and friends who wish to stay there (10 days maximum). Also, during July and September the residence is open for people or groups linked to University, culture or Spanish learning. It s closed at Christmas, Easter and in August.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe
basicData.body:
The residence hall Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe was built by the architect Luis Feduchi in 1953. It has four floors for university students, professors and researchers invited by Universidad Complutense de Madrid and the Spanish Agency of International Cooperation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation.

Located in the University district, it also provides accommodation to fellow researchers from over 60 different nationalities involved in masters, doctorates and other studies, in universities, foundations, enterprises, etc. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included from Monday to Saturday. Open all year round, Christmas and Easter included.

They also have classrooms and assembly halls to rent for external activities. This is a place of Spanish-American character, open to cultural, educational and scientific cooperation between Spain and the rest of the world. Throughout its history, this residence has been and still is a meeting point for Latin-American intellectuals and artists and important culture and politics people from those countries.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Santa María del Estudiante
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Santa María del Estudiante
basicData.body:
The Colegio Mayor Santa María del Estudiante, situated close to the University district, belongs to the RESA student residence group, which provides modern and versatile student accommodation. This women’s residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid offers accommodation to university students, women preparing competitive examinations or doctorates, and researchers. Services offered: breakfast, lunch and dinner included from Monday to Friday (breakfast and lunch on Saturdays), bed linen wash.

Common facilities: sports centre with night lighting, swimming pool, table tennis room, library, study room, classrooms, assembly hall, TV rooms, architecture room, car park, laundry and dryer on each floor, Internet wireless access throughout the entire residence. Closed for Christmas, Easter and August. Available in July for external activities.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Alcor
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Alcor
basicData.body:
Colegio Mayor Alcor is an institution attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid (UCM). It is located right in the middle of the university area –close to the Universidad Complutense campus and the Technical University (Politécnica) - with good connections to the city centre. This women’s residence hall founded in 1963 is a corporative work by the Prelature of Opus Dei, an organization of the Roman Catholic Church.

They have single and triple rooms provided with towels and sheets, washing and ironing service, daily cleaning, breakfast, lunch and dinner included (also weekends and holidays), food to take to university, library and chapel. They also have several study rooms, assembly hall, architect studio, computer room, swimming pool and basketball court. They organize activities like seminars, cultural gatherings, trips, sports (volley, tennis, basketball, football), etc.

basicData.name: Espahotel Plaza de España
basicData.title: Espahotel Plaza de España
basicData.body:
Its perfect location in one of the main arteries in Madrid, makes this aparthotel a highly recommended option to stay in while visiting the city. It is very close to interesting historical and cultural monuments (Palacio Real, Catedral de la Almudena, Madrid de los Austrias), several theatres, cinemas and the commercial area.

They have 7 suites (bedroom, independent living room, bathroom and private kitchen) and 79 apartment studios (double room, bathroom and private kitchen). They also offer 3 apartment studios designed for the disabled: apartments of bigger dimensions with extra wide access doors and bathrooms.

All rooms have air conditioning, safe-deposit box, heating, telephone, TV… Other facilities and common services offered are disabled access, foreign exchange, fax and copying, car rental and room service, among others.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Fundación SEPI
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Fundación SEPI
basicData.body:
This is a university institution attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid managed by the Foundation of the same name which, in turn, is managed by Sociedad Estatal de Participaciones Industriales (SEPI). Students and post graduates admitted. It is located in the University district and well connected to the facilities of UCM.

All the rooms are single (and four for disabled people). Rooms are provided with bathroom, air conditioning, telephone, Internet access and electronic card-operated door locks. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included everyday except Sundays and holidays, medical centre, laundry service, cleaning service, reading room with newspapers and magazines, library, assembly hall, TV room and special rooms for architecture, computers, photography and music, video-recording, etc., sport facilities and swimming pool.

They also have a telescope and other related appliances for those interested in astronomy. Wide programme with cultural, sports and academic activities. The residence is open all year round except Christmas and Easter. During summer months (July, August and September) the residence is offered to people or groups related to other projects and activities: business studies, Spanish for foreigners, culture and sport.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Vedruna
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Vedruna
basicData.body:
This residence hall was founded in 1968 by the religious congregation of Hermanas Carmelitas de la Caridad Vedruna and was acknowledged as a women’s residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid in 1972. It is located in the Chamberí district, well connected to many of the Madrid universities.

All rooms are single with shower. Cleaning is student’s responsibility. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included (except Saturday dinner and Sunday). Bed linen and towels laundry service. Residents have washing machines for personal use at their disposal.

The residence aims to promote cultural, social, religious and sport development among residents. In teams or groups, residents participate in the organization of activities for the academic year: lectures, round tables, gatherings, theatre, solidarity campaigns, sports competitions…

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Padre Poveda
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Padre Poveda
basicData.body:
This women’s residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid is managed by Asociación Civil Institución Teresiana. This place is located in a quiet residential area with big green spaces and excellent connections through public transport.

Single and double rooms with breakfast, lunch and dinner included (except Sundays), telephone, Internet access, heating, air conditioning and laundry service. Common facilities: assembly hall, lecture hall, chapel, library, study rooms, computer rooms, TV rooms, sitting rooms, multipurpose room, dining room, cafeteria, and sport facilities (swimming pool and sports centre). Organization of pastoral, cultural, artistic and sports activities throughout the year. Closed for Christmas and Easter.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Zurbarán
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Zurbarán
basicData.body:
This women’s residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid opened its doors in 1956 as an apostolic work of the Prelature of the Opus Dei, an organization of the Roman Catholic Church. It is situated in the Chamartín district, in the north of Madrid.

It is provided with study rooms, computer room, library, sitting room with TV, reading room, assembly hall, swimming pool and sports court. They offer single, double and triple rooms with breakfast, lunch and dinner included (also at weekends). They prepare food to take to university and even special diets upon medical prescription. Services offered: laundry, room cleaning, chapel. Organization of different activities –academic, cultural, solidarity, sports, etc.- throughout the academic year.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Berrospe
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Berrospe
basicData.body:
Colegio Mayor Berrospe is a women’s residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid. It is a member of the National Counsil of University Halls of Residence (Consejo Nacional de Colegios Mayores y Residencias Universitarias). It is a Roman Catholic residence managed by the Congregación de las Hijas de Jesús from the academic year 1968-69. The hall is located in Chamberí and is well connected to the main universities in the city.

You have to fulfil the following requirements to be admitted: you must study at university and accept the Christian identity and other college educational objectives. It has single and double rooms provided with toilet, breakfast, lunch and dinner included and self service in the dining room (except Sundays). The college closes from 15th July to 3rd September.

Common facilities: library, sports centre, sitting room and TV room, gym, computer room, etc. They also organize different activities during the academic year: theatre, sports, pastoral-solidarity, cultural events, lectures, seminar-workshops…

basicData.name: Apartamentos Sercotel Togumar
basicData.title: Aparthotel Sercotel Togumar
basicData.body:
Aparthotel Togumar - Sercotel Group- is located at the North end of Paseo de la Castellana, in the Principe de Vergara area, very close to the National Music Auditorium and  only 15 minutes by car from the airport..

Aparthotel Sercotel Togumar offers functional and welcoming studio apartments with 24 hour reception service. You can decide to rent them for days or take the advantages of renting it for months. All accommodations are equipped with heating and air conditioning, desk and kitchenette. Other room facilities are safe-deposit box, mini bar, telephone, TV with international channels… The aparthotel also offers free WiFi access, private dining room, car rental, garage, laundry service, fax, terrace and buffet breakfast.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Diego de Covarrubias
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Diego de Covarrubias
basicData.body:
The residence hall ‘Diego de Covarrubias’ was directly founded by Universidad Complutense de Madrid in 1952 under the name of Santa María del Campo. Its current name was coined in 1956. This men’s residence hall is directly managed by Universidad Complutense de Madrid through the administrative institution of residence halls belonging to Universidad Complutense. This institution is in charge of the management of the university’s educational tasks.

The residence hall organizes different activities during the academic year such as conferences, round tables, debates, exhibitions, courses, concerts, film projections, sports, visits to museums, trips to other towns, etc. The residence hall has single and double rooms, all of them provided with bathroom and Internet WiFi access. Besides, they have special rooms for computers, electronics, carpentry, model aircraft, radio and photography, architecture, classic music and modern music, gym, table tennis… and library (containing more than 15.000 books as well as a section for films and documentaries).

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Universitario Mendel
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Universitario Mendel
basicData.body:
This is a men’s university residence hall run by the organization Provincia Agustiniana Matritense (Order of Saint Augustine), attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid and located in the University district.

All the rooms are single, provided with telephone and Internet access, breakfast, lunch and dinner included (even weekends and holidays), bed linen, weekly laundry service, room cleaning, medical service, religious service and additional cultural activities.

Some of the facilities offered are café, library, chapel, newspaper room, reading room, music room, video room, TV room, computer room, assembly hall, multipurpose room, two study rooms with air conditioning, photography lab, copying, hairdresser and private parking area. They also have sports facilities like sports court (for football, basketball, tennis, etc.) and swimming pool.

From the total number of places, there are several reserved for post-graduate students (masters, doctorates) and students preparing competitive examinations. It remains closed at Christmas, Easter and in August. During July and August, the premises are available for national and international university students and groups for external activities.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Alcalá
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Alcalá
basicData.body:
Colegio Mayor Universitario Alcalá is a men’s residence hall managed by the Claretian missionaries since 1967 and attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid since 1973. They aim to promote the integral education of students through living together and a series of activities based on their principles and ideas. Sports, religious and cultural activities are the means to achieve these goals. The Halls are located in the University zone.

 It offers single rooms with private full bathroom. Some of the services and facilities offered are washing machine, fax and copying, Internet in every room, library, study rooms, graphic room, chapel, TV/living room, video room, sports court (tennis, basketball, handball, indoor football), etc. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included from Monday to Friday. Just lunch on Saturday, Sunday and holidays. Closed at Christmas, Easter and in August.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Mater Salvatoris
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Mater Salvatoris
basicData.body:
This is a women’s residence hall managed by members of the religious order Compañía del Salvador, attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid. They offer single rooms (and five double rooms) with breakfast, lunch and dinner included and laundry service for bed linen.

Situated in Aravaca, they have excellent sports facilities: basketball, andball, volleyball, indoor soccer, tennis and gym. They also have a chapel, library, conference hall and computer room. They organize interesting activities for residents such as lectures, seminars or gatherings. Closed for Christmas, Easter and summer.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Universitario Loyola
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Universitario Loyola
basicData.body:
This is a mixed residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid, founded in 1969 by the religious order of Compañía de Jesús aiming to provide resident students with an appropriate educational ambience and contribute to their integral education. The residence is located close to the University district, in the Metropolitano area.

All rooms are single, provided with Internet access, heating, air conditioning and complete bathroom. They offer full board, thus helping residents to participate and feel a part of the residence hall community. Common facilities: dining hall, cafeteria, TV rooms, music room, library, assembly hall/cinema, chapel, sitting and press room, study rooms, computer room, video and CD library, pastoral service, copying, plotter, gym, sports court and swimming pool. They also have automatic washing machines and dryers as well as laundry service.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor Jorge Juan
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor Jorge Juan
basicData.body: This residence hall is managed by the Ministry of Defence-Navy and only children of people working for the armed forces are admitted. Throughout the academic year important military and university figures give lectures, seminars and gatherings. It is located in the Moncloa student residential area, well connected to the University district.

basicData.name: Abalú
basicData.title: Abalú
basicData.body:
Hotel Abalú offers something that not many others can: a haven of peace and serenity in one of the busiest areas in the city, the Malasaña neighbourhood, with which it shares its young and innovative spirit. It also takes pride in being a small hotel, with 15 rooms, giving customers a personalised attention in a designers’ atmosphere, which is not very common in three-star hotels.

The decor is by interior designer Luis Delgado, who has used the latest tendencies to dress every corner of this boutique hotel, giving it a modern yet elegant air. Every one of its rooms is unique, with a different decoration, atmosphere and equipment. There are rooms to suit every taste: with Jacuzzi, stone bath tubs, film projectors... but they all have one thing in common: an avant-garde style.

basicData.name: Colegio Mayor San Agustín
basicData.title: Colegio Mayor San Agustín
basicData.body:
This residence hall attached to Universidad Complutense de Madrid was founded and is currently managed by the order of San Agustín. Its objective is to promote cultural, scientific, social and religious education among university students and post graduates (doctorates, masters, competitive examinations…) staying at the residence. It is located in the centre of the Moncloa student residential area, a few minutes from the University district.

They offer single rooms provided with bathroom, TV and Internet access. The common facilities offered are reading room, assembly hall, laundry, cinema, music room, photography studio, gym, video library, car park, swimming pool, nursery, library, study rooms, chapel and computer room. Breakfast, lunch and dinner included except Sunday dinner and 1st May dinner. Open during July and August upon request.

basicData.name: Hospes Madrid
basicData.title: Hospes Madrid
basicData.body:
Hotel Hospes, opened in autumn 2007 and combines elegant shapes, haute cuisine and revitalizing purity in a financial, cultural and artistic environment opposite Puerta de Alcalá and El Retiro park.

Based in an eclectic building dating from 1883, the former residence of the Duchess Widow of General Prim, the hotel has maintained the original structure creating a contrast with the modern and elegant interior decor, marked by a Zen-style philosophy and a predominance of white and wood.

Gastronomy is one of the strong points of Hotel Hospes, with Restaurante Independencia. The hotel’s other main attraction is the Bodyna Spa & Wellness, a space for relaxation, rest and wellness in an atmosphere where light, wood and glass prevail. Here, guests can enjoy both Asian and Western-style massages and treatments or release tension in the fitness area, drop by the hair salon or relax in the Turkish bath.

basicData.name: María Cristina
basicData.title: María Cristina
basicData.body:
This two-star hostel is located on one of the city's most famous shopping streets, Calle de Fuencarral. It is just a short walk from Madrid's historic centre, with its monuments, theatres, shops, and restaurants, as well as the lively district of Chueca, which offers some great nightlife, among other things.

Its rooms come with everything you need for guaranteed comfort and rest. They are large, luminous, and have air conditioning and central heating.

basicData.name: María Luisa
basicData.title: María Luisa
basicData.body: Offering an unbeatable location, right by Gran Vía, with excellent transport links, the María Luisa hostel is an ideal place to enjoy a peaceful and pleasant stay in the centre of Madrid. All the rooms have their own private bathroom, air conditioning, heating, telephone, television, safe, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: María Ronda
basicData.title: María Ronda
basicData.body: This three-star hostel is located in the south of Madrid, in the famous district of Carabanchel, with excellent public transport links to the city centre. All the rooms have their own private bathroom, heating, air conditioning, telephone, television, and free Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Hostal la Macarena
basicData.title: Hostal la Macarena
basicData.body: This small hostel offers spacious rooms and good value for money in the heart of Madrid, surrounded by a host of shops, bars, and restaurants. Recently renovated, the hostel has comfortable rooms with air conditioning, safe, television, and private bathroom with hair dryer.

basicData.name: Hostal Lido
basicData.title: Hostal Lido
basicData.body: This welcoming friendly hostel is located in Madrid's historic centre, just a stone's throw from the Puerta del Sol. It is in the Barrio de las Letras, a district famous for its many bars and pubs, where you can enjoy the city's best tapas and nightlife. All the rooms have their own bathroom with bathtub, air conditioning, heating, television, fridge, and hair dryer.

basicData.name: Milabi
basicData.title: Milabi
basicData.body: This hostel is located in one of the most traditional and authentic areas of Madrid, the district of Chamberí, close to cinemas, theatres, museums, restaurants, bars and clubs, and shopping areas. The rooms offer heating, air conditioning, en-suite bathroom, television, and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Mairu
basicData.title: Mairu
basicData.body: This hostel, which has been fully renovated, is situated in the famous district of Los Austrias, within striking distance of the city's major tourist spots, restaurants, shops, car parks, green areas, and shopping malls. All the rooms have a private bathroom, television, and minibar

basicData.name: Montecarlo
basicData.title: Montecarlo
basicData.body: Located right on Gran Vía itself, the Montecarlo hostel has large comfortable rooms decorated in a classic style. They all have an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, heating, television, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Hostal Madrid
basicData.title: Hostal Madrid
basicData.body: This centrally located hostel is housed in a 19th Century building in Madrid's historic centre, between the city's two major squares: Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor, the main tourist and shopping area. All the rooms have private bathroom, hair dryer, television, heating, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi in all areas.

basicData.name: Hostal Martín
basicData.title: Hostal Martín
basicData.body: Apart from its excellent location in the Literary Quarter, this hostel has some other outstanding facilities such as bathroom in every room, air conditioning, telephone, TV (with English, German, French and Italian channels), free wireless Internet access and free Internet service in the reception hall for customers, private safe deposit-box, parking facilities and free luggage room. Pleasant and attentive service.

basicData.name: Jemasaca-Palma 61
basicData.title: Jemasaca-Palma 61
basicData.body: This newly refurbished hostel is located in the heart of Malasaña, one of the city’s liveliest districts. Thanks to its wonderful location, travellers can reach the city’s most emblematic spots on foot, such as the Gran Vía, the Plaza de España and the district of Chueca.  The area is also surrounded by shops, theatres, cinemas, bars, and restaurants. The rooms come with a fully fitted bathroom, air conditioning and heating, flat screen TV, and free Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Josefina
basicData.title: Josefina
basicData.body:
This three star hostel is located on one of the city’s major arteries, Gran Vía. Thanks to this outstanding location, it is just a few minutes from tourist hotspots such as the Puerta del Sol, the Plaza Mayor, the Royal Palace, and El Retiro Park. It is also surrounded by several shopping areas such as Calle de Fuencarral and Calle Preciados. 

Hostal Josefina Madrid has a total of 23 single, double, triple, and quadruple rooms, all with their own private bathroom with shower and hair dryer, as well as TV, safe, air conditioning, heating, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Kryse
basicData.title: Kryse
basicData.body: Hostel set on one of Madrid’s most emblematic streets, Calle de Fuencarral, between the districts of Malasaña and Chueca. Recently refurbished, the hostel has a total of 8 rooms including singles, twins, doubles and triples, all with their own bathroom, heating, air conditioning, television and telephone.

basicData.name: Hostal Lamalonga
basicData.title: Hostal Lamalonga
basicData.body: Located in the heart of Gran Vía, Lamalonga is a friendly hostel with over three decades of experience. The rooms are simple and comfortable, all with their own bathroom, safe, air conditioning, heating, Wi-Fi and balcony. Thanks to its location, right in the city centre, it offers a wide range of leisure and entertainment options near by as well as shops and restaurants.

basicData.name: Praktik Metropol
basicData.title: Praktik Metropol
basicData.body:
This modern hotel with around 60 rooms, is right in the centre of Madrid, between the Gran Vía and la Puerta del Sol. With affordable prices, it describes itself as a "low cost designer hotel", - offering an attractive combination of tradition, as represented in the majestic façade, and the more modern interior characterised by functional but cheery design.

The business which previously occupied these premises was also a hotel. The interior remodelling is the work of Lázaro Rosa-Violán and Contemporain Studio and the final product is a relaxing, comfortable space of luxurious simplicity. The warm and cosy interior is completed with wooden floors, white walls and designer details, with a highlight being the 30 metre high terrace offering beautiful views across the city.

basicData.name: Luis XV
basicData.title: Luis XV
basicData.body: This hostel is set in the heart of the city, just a stone's throw from Puerta del Sol, making it a good base to explore easily the heart of Madrid and the numerous shops, restaurants, and bars in this area. It has a total of 36 rooms, all with air conditioning, heating, telephone, television, private bathroom, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Lisboa
basicData.title: Lisboa
basicData.body: Three-star hostel located in the district of Las Letras, just a few metres from the Paseo del Arte – Art Walk and its major museums: the Prado, the Thyssen and the Reina Sofía. Furthermore, thanks to its outstanding location, guests can easily reach some of Madrid’s most emblematic spots, such as the Gran Vía, Alcalá, the Puerta del Sol, the Royal Palace, the Teatro Real Opera House, the Plaza Mayor, the Botanical Gardens, and El Retiro Park. All the rooms have air conditioning, heating, Wi-Fi and their own bathroom.

basicData.name: Lauria
basicData.title: Lauria
basicData.body: Located right on Madrid’s Gran Vía, Hostal Lauria is an ideal place to visit some of city’s most emblematic spots, such as the Puerta del Sol, the Plaza de España and the Plaza Mayor. It is also surrounded by theatres, shops, and restaurants. It has 21 rooms – single, twin, double, triple, and quadruple – all with TV, air conditioning, heating, Wi-Fi, safe and telephone.

basicData.name: Ch Galaica
basicData.title: Galaica
basicData.body: This hostel is located in the exclusive Salamanca district, surrounded by shopping, cultural and entertainment hotspots, and just a short walk from Las Ventas bullring, El Retiro Park, and the Puerta de Alcalá. The rooms have heating, television, and private bathroom with shower.

basicData.name: Galaico
basicData.title: Galaico
basicData.body: This hostel, located in the heart of Madrid's Gran Vía, provides comfortable, quiet accommodation with a family feel, ideal for travellers looking to enjoy the city's art, gastronomy and nightlife. It offers single rooms with private bathroom, air conditioning, safe, and television.

basicData.name: Parajas
basicData.title: Parajas
basicData.body: Hostel located in the centre of Madrid, close to the Paseo del Prado, between Puerta del Sol and Atocha station, and very close to various tourist hot spots such as the Puerta del Sol itself, El Retiro Park, the Puerta de Alcalá, and the Cibeles and Neptuno fountains, among others. All the rooms have air conditioning, heating, wi-fi connection and en-suite bathroom.

basicData.name: Gallardo
basicData.title: Gallardo
basicData.body: A quiet, reasonably priced hostel located by Madrid's Gran Vía, in the lively Calle de Fuencarral, ideal for tourists and business travellers. It has twelve rooms, all with natural light. They have heating and air conditioning, private bathroom, television, safe, and free Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Nuestra Señora de Sonsoles
basicData.title: Nuestra Señora de Sonsoles
basicData.body:
This two-star hostel is located on one of Madrid's busiest streets, Calle de Fuencarral, between the districts of Chueca and Malasaña, an area buzzing with shops, restaurants, bars, and clubs. 

There are single, double, and triple rooms, all with en-suite bathroom. They have air conditioning, Wi-Fi, safe, telephone, television, and hair dryer for the comfort of guests.

basicData.name: Gonzalo
basicData.title: Gonzalo
basicData.body: This hostel is located right in the Literary Quarter of Madrid, in a renovated building from the 19th century. Their comfortable rooms are provided with private bathroom and TV. Besides, they have air conditioning, central heating, WiFi access, 24 hours reception service and luggage room.  Attentive service and personalized attention.

basicData.name: Hostal el Pilar
basicData.title: Hostal el Pilar
basicData.body: Just 50 metres from the Puerta del Sol, this hostel offers friendly service and a pleasant environment. Recently renovated, it offers 38 rooms all with fully fitted bathroom, flat screen TV, telephone, safe, free Wi-Fi, and air conditioning.

basicData.name: Fuente Mar
basicData.title: Fuente Mar
basicData.body: Hostel located in the central district of Las Letras, just a stone's throw from the Puerta del Sol, the Plaza Santa Ana, the Prado Museum, and the Plaza Mayor. It has 13 rooms, all with television, sink, and shared bathroom. Most of them also have a balcony.

basicData.name: Hostal Greco
basicData.title: Hostal Greco
basicData.body: The Hostal Greco offers the perfect combination of quality and a good price. It is located right in the heart of Madrid's tourist and shopping area, just a stone's throw from Gran Vía and very close to the Puerta del Sol and the Plaza Mayor. It also offers a host of leisure and entertainment options on your doorstep: cinemas, theatres, restaurants, shopping areas…

basicData.name: Hispano
basicData.title: Hispano
basicData.body: This friendly family hostel is located on one of the city's liveliest streets, Calle de Hortaleza. Its location, between the shopping area of Calle Fuencarral and the district of Chueca, makes it an ideal base to enjoy the city's restaurants, theatres, museums, and historic monuments. All the rooms have flat screen TV, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, heating, and safe.

basicData.name: Madrid Gran Vía LXIII
basicData.title: Madrid Gran Vía LXIII
basicData.body: Formerly the Hispano America Hostal, it was renovated between 2009 and 2010, and is now the Hostal Madrid Gran Vía LXIII situated in the centre of the city, right on Madrid's Gran Via , between Plaza de Callao and Plaza de España. One of the most sought after areas of the city to stay in as the main tourists sights are easily accessible on foot as well as by the main means of transport.

basicData.name: Hispano Argentino
basicData.title: Hispano Argentino
basicData.body: Reasonably priced, renovated hostel with modern facilities, located at the city's nerve centre, on the sixth floor of a neoclassical modernist building. It is walking distance from several of the city's tourist and cultural attractions, such as the Prado Museum, the Reina Sofía Museum, the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, and the Royal Palace. All the rooms at the Hispano-Argentino have air conditioning, heating, minibar, television with international channels, and private bathroom with hair dryer.

basicData.name: La Nava
basicData.title: La Nava
basicData.body:
This hostel is located in the district of Salamanca, between the Plaza de Manuel Becerra and Goya, right on Calle de Alcalá, just a few minutes’ walk from emblematic places such as Las Ventas bullring, El Retiro Park, and Madrid’s Sports Palace. It is also within easy reach of the city centre. 

La Nava is a newly refurbished hostel. All its rooms have heating, air conditioning, bathroom, television and internet connection.

basicData.name: Narváez
basicData.title: Narváez
basicData.body:
This one-star hostel is located in the exclusive Salamanca district, just a short walk from El Retiro Park and from Madrid's most representative museums: the Prado, the Thyssen-Bornenisza, the Reina Sofía, and the National Museum of Archaeology.

It has 11 rooms each with its own fully fitted bathroom, television and air conditioning, as well as central heating, wardrobe, desk, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Ginebra
basicData.title: Ginebra
basicData.body: This hostel is located in the district of Malasaña, on one of Madrid's major shopping streets, Calle de Fuencarral. It provides an ideal base to explore the city and visit most of the city's tourist spots: the Plaza Mayor, the Teatro Real Opera House, the Prado Museum, El Retiro Park, and the city's major museums. The rooms have their own private bathroom, flat screen TV, wardrobe, and telephone.

basicData.name: Persal
basicData.title: Persal
basicData.body:
This hostel was built respecting the structure of the old building from 1871. It is located in the Literary Quarter, in the historical and tourist centre of Madrid, in a pedestrian area, with vehicle access allowed just for taxis and residents.

The hostel's functional rooms are equipped with private bathroom, telephone, satellite TV, air conditioning and safe deposit-box. Furthermore, they have two meeting rooms originally built with handcrafted solid bricks, with capacity for up to 50 people. Special prices for customers of the Spa Excellence (Palacio de Santa Ana). Simple and functional.

basicData.name: Fernández
basicData.title: Fernández
basicData.body: Comfortable hostel, centrally located close to Parliament, the Plaza de Santa Ana and the Puerta del Sol. It is surrounded by bars and restaurants thanks to its location in one of Madrid's most important areas for leisure and entertainment. The rooms have air conditioning, free Wi-Fi connection, and private bathroom.

basicData.name: Far Home Plaza Mayor
basicData.title: Far Home Plaza Mayor
basicData.body: Hostel located right in the centre of Madrid, by the famous Plaza de Tirso de Molina. It offers affordable accommodation with a retro, but at the same time modern and welcoming design. There is a large communal area with computers offering internet connection, Wi-Fi, TV, reading room. All the hostel’s rooms have air conditioning, heating, television, desk, and a wardrobe.

basicData.name: Fuente Sol
basicData.title: Fuente Sol
basicData.body: Centrally located hostel by the Puerta del Sol and just a short walk from the Plaza Mayor, the Royal Palace, and the Plaza de Oriente. It offers single rooms, fully equipped with a shower or bathroom, air conditioning, heating, television, and free Wi-Fi access.

basicData.name: Flores
basicData.title: Flores
basicData.body: This is a pleasant and simple hostel superbly located in the central street of Gran Vía, with fantastic views of part of the city and the mountains. It has ten big, light rooms, all of them exterior rooms with balcony. They have heating, satellite TV and they offer the option of taking breakfast to your room.

basicData.name: La Perla Asturiana
basicData.title: La Perla Asturiana
basicData.body: Small two-star hostel located in the heart of Madrid, on the emblematic Gran Vía. It offers different types of rooms: singles, doubles, triples, and family rooms, all with air conditioning, Wi-Fi and their own private bathroom.

basicData.name: Don Pedro
basicData.title: Don Pedro
basicData.body: Hostel located in the district of Carabanchel, an area with good metro links to the city centre. It has been recently renovated, and the rooms have parquet flooring, central heating, a desk, private bathroom, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi connection and a plasma TV.

basicData.name: La Plata
basicData.title: La Plata
basicData.body: This hostel is located on one of the city’s major arteries, Gran Vía, an ideal base to explore the capital as it is just a few minutes from tourist spots such as the Plaza Mayor, the Puerta del Sol and the Paseo del Arte (Art Walk), as well as shopping areas, restaurants, and nightspots. Hostal la Plata offers different types of rooms, all with Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: Palacios Ribadavia
basicData.title: Palacios Ribadavia
basicData.body: Hostal situado en la calle Fuencarral a escasos 150 metros de la Gran Vía, en pleno corazón turístico, de ocio, comercial y cultural de Madrid. Sus habitaciones disponen de aire acondicionado, calefacción y baño privado.

basicData.name: Emilio
basicData.title: Emilio
basicData.body: This hostel is located in the town of Barajas, just one metro stop from the city’s airport and very close to Ifema, Juan Carlos I Park and El Capricho Park, one of the prettiest spots in Madrid. It has twelve spacious, luminous and comfortable bedrooms, all with their own bathroom, television, air conditioning and heating.

basicData.name: Prim
basicData.title: Prim
basicData.body:
This hostel is situated in a historic building from the early 20th century, a time reflected in a lift which has kept the old style combined with the current security measures. It has been newly renovated and all rooms have the usual services (air conditioning, heating, telephone, safe deposit-box…). Besides, they offer free services like mini-fridge or luggage room for the day you leave, among others. They also have fax service.

The staff speaks both English and French fluently, thus being a good choice for international tourists. The street where it is located –calle Prim- is close to Paseo de Recoletos and the main cultural and leisure attractions, but it is a very calm area at the same time.

basicData.name: Don Alfonso
basicData.title: Don Alfonso
basicData.body: Two-star hostel located in the city centre, just a stone's throw from Puerta del Sol and the Plaza Mayor. It has 19 spacious, luminous, comfortable, fully equipped rooms, with wooden floors, private bathroom, air conditioning, television, free Wi-Fi connection, desk, safe, and telephone.

basicData.name: Esmeralda
basicData.title: Esmeralda
basicData.body: Esmeralda is a small, welcoming, family-run two-star hostel, located right by the Puerta del Sol. It has 19 rooms with air conditioning, heating, double glazing, free Wi-Fi internet connection and private bathroom.

basicData.name: Esparteros
basicData.title: Esparteros
basicData.body: Hostel located in the heart of Madrid, in a street lined with shops selling religious objects, clothing, footwear, costumes, fabrics, and stamps, right by the Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol. Its rooms have heating, private bathrooms, television, and Wi-Fi.

basicData.name: Plaza d'Ort
basicData.title: Plaza d'Ort
basicData.body: Located in the very centre of Madrid, in the famous district of Las Letras, we find this small one star hostel, close to the popular Calle de Huertas and the Plaza de Santa Ana. Its rooms have en-suite bathroom, television, telephone, safe, heating, and Wi-Fi connection.

basicData.name: JC Rooms Puerta del Sol
basicData.title: JC Rooms Puerta del Sol
basicData.body: Original three star hotel located by the Ópera metro stop, in the heart of Madrid's Los Austrias district. At JC Rooms, each of the rooms is inspired by one of the city's emblematic monuments, decorated in bright colours with avant-garde furniture and equipped with air conditioning, fully fitted bathroom with a hydromassage shower, computer with free internet connection, flatscreen TV and free minibar.

basicData.name: Hostal Residencia Don Diego
basicData.title: Hostal Residencia Don Diego
basicData.body: This hostel is superbly located in one of the smartest areas in Madrid: barrio de Salamanca, close to Retiro Park and Colón square. It is one of the most prestigious residential, commercial and business areas of the city. Rooms are provided with bathroom, air conditioning, central heating, satellite TV, telephone, and private safe deposit-box, among other services. Some rooms have a balcony. Besides, they have a baggage room, laundry service, dry cleaner’s and café-bar. Pleasant ambience and attentive service.

basicData.name: Comercial
basicData.title: Comercial
basicData.body: Situated in central Madrid, the Comercial is perfect for staying in a hostel close to Madrid’s major museums: Prado, Thyssen-Bornemisza and Reina Sofía. It is also close to other attractions like the Royal Palace, Plaza Mayor or Puerta del Sol. The hostel has 11 exterior rooms letting in plenty of daylight. All rooms have fully fitted bathrooms.

basicData.name: Woohoo Hostal Madrid
basicData.title: Woohoo Hostal Madrid
basicData.body: Centrally located, this hostel features more than 14 rooms of a variety of types. Ideal for tourists visiting Madrid to relax and enjoy. All the rooms have TV, reading lamps, bed linen and toiletries.

basicData.name: Conchita
basicData.title: Conchita
basicData.body: The Conchita hostel is the perfect choice for visitors who come to spend a few days in Madrid. It’s a few steps away from Plaza de Callao, Puerta del Sol and Gran Vía. The rooms have TV, refrigerator, microwave oven, air conditioning and private bathroom.

basicData.name: Delfina
basicData.title: Delfina
basicData.body: This hostel is situated in Madrid’s Gran Vía, close to bars, restaurants and theatres. Puerta del Sol, the Royal Palace and Plaza Mayor are nearby attractions. Delfina is easily accessed by underground or bus. The rooms offer a sitting area, private bathroom with bathtub and towels, and bed linen. Luggage storage and tourist information services available.

basicData.name: La Prensa
basicData.title: La Prensa
basicData.body: Small two-star hostel located in central Madrid, on the eighth floor of one of the most emblematic buildings on Gran Vía, the Palacio de la Prensa. It is an ideal location to discover the city’s major tourist attractions, museums, and shopping areas. All the rooms have heating and air conditioning, Wi-Fi, private bathroom with bathtub or shower, and television.

basicData.name: Dulcinea
basicData.title: Dulcinea
basicData.body: This hostel is located in Madrid's Las Letras district, just a short walk from the city's major museums, the Thyssen, the Reina Sofía and the Prado. Its rooms have their own bathroom, air conditioning, flat screen TV and free wireless internet connection. It is an ideal option for travellers interested in discovering Madrid's nightlife, gastronomy, and art.

basicData.name: Continental
basicData.title: Continental
basicData.body: This hostel located right on Gran Vía in Madrid has 30 rooms with air conditioning, TV, safe and private bathroom. The area has lots of shops, bars, restaurants and theatres.

basicData.name: Hostal Santo Domingo
basicData.title: Hostal Santo Domingo
basicData.body:
